113// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
114class ClosestKindOfData
115{
116public:
117
118 ClosestKindOfData( void );
119
120 //In
121 KindOfMaskType m_setKindOf;
122 KindOfMaskType m_clearKindOf;
123 Object *m_source;
124
125 //Out
126 Object *m_closest;
127 Real m_closestDistSq;
128
129};
130
131// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132ClosestKindOfData::ClosestKindOfData( void )
133{
134 m_setKindOf.clear();
135 m_clearKindOf.clear();
136 m_source = NULL;
137 m_closest = NULL;
138 m_closestDistSq = FLT_MAX;
139}
140
141// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
142static void findClosestKindOf( Object *obj, void *userData )
143{
144 ClosestKindOfData *closestData = (ClosestKindOfData *)userData;
145
146 if( ! obj->isKindOfMulti( closestData->m_setKindOf, closestData->m_clearKindOf ) )
147 return; // Do nothing to the magic running total pointer man.
148
149 // is this the closest one so far
150 Real distSq = ThePartitionManager->getDistanceSquared( closestData->m_source, obj, FROM_CENTER_2D );
151 if( distSq < closestData->m_closestDistSq )
152 {
153 closestData->m_closest = obj;
154 closestData->m_closestDistSq = distSq;
155 }
156}

162#ifdef DEBUG_CRC
163#define CRCDUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(x,y,z) dumpBattlePlanBonuses(x, #x, y, z, __FILE__, __LINE__, FALSE)
164#define DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(x,y,z) dumpBattlePlanBonuses(x, #x, y, z, __FILE__, __LINE__, TRUE)
165AsciiString kindofMaskAsAsciiString(KindOfMaskType m)
166{
167 AsciiString s;
168 const char** kindofNames = KindOfMaskType::getBitNames();
169 for (Int i=KINDOF_FIRST; i<KINDOF_COUNT; ++i)
170 {
171 if (m.test(i))
172 {
173 if (s.isNotEmpty())
174 s.concat("|");
175 s.concat(kindofNames[i]);
176 }
177 }
178 if (s.isEmpty())
179 s = "KINDOF_INVALID";
180 return s;
181}
182void dumpBattlePlanBonuses(const BattlePlanBonuses *b, AsciiString name, const Player *p, const Object *o, AsciiString fname, Int line, Bool doDebugLog)
183{
184 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("dumpBattlePlanBonuses() %s:%d %s\n Player %d(%ls) object %d(%s) armor:%g/%8.8X bombardment:%d, holdTheLine:%d, searchAndDestroy:%d sight:%g/%8.8X, valid:%s invalid:%s\n",
185 fname.str(), line, name.str(),
186 (p)?p->getPlayerIndex():-1, (p)?((Player *)p)->getPlayerDisplayName().str():L"<No Name>", (o)?o->getID():-1, (o)?o->getTemplate()->getName().str():"<No Name>",
187 b->m_armorScalar, AS_INT(b->m_armorScalar),
188 b->m_bombardment, b->m_holdTheLine, b->m_searchAndDestroy,
189 b->m_sightRangeScalar, AS_INT(b->m_sightRangeScalar),
190 kindofMaskAsAsciiString(b->m_validKindOf).str(),
191 kindofMaskAsAsciiString(b->m_invalidKindOf).str()));
192 if (!doDebugLog)
193 return;
194 DEBUG_LOG(("dumpBattlePlanBonuses() %s:%d %s\n Player %d(%ls) object %d(%s) armor:%g/%8.8X bombardment:%d, holdTheLine:%d, searchAndDestroy:%d sight:%g/%8.8X, valid:%s invalid:%s\n",
195 fname.str(), line, name.str(),
196 (p)?p->getPlayerIndex():-1, (p)?((Player *)p)->getPlayerDisplayName().str():L"<No Name>", (o)?o->getID():-1, (o)?o->getTemplate()->getName().str():"<No Name>",
197 b->m_armorScalar, AS_INT(b->m_armorScalar),
198 b->m_bombardment, b->m_holdTheLine, b->m_searchAndDestroy,
199 b->m_sightRangeScalar, AS_INT(b->m_sightRangeScalar),
200 kindofMaskAsAsciiString(b->m_validKindOf).str(),
201 kindofMaskAsAsciiString(b->m_invalidKindOf).str()));
202}
203#else
204#define DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(x,y,z) {}
205#define CRCDUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(x,y,z) {}
206#endif // DEBUG_CRC

233// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
238// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
239void PlayerRelationMap::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
240{
241
242 // version
243 XferVersion currentVersion = 1;
244 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
245 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
246
247 // player relation count
248 PlayerRelationMapType::iterator playerRelationIt;
249 UnsignedShort playerRelationCount = m_map.size();
250 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &playerRelationCount );
251
252 // player relations
253 Int playerIndex;
254 Relationship r;
255 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
256 {
257
258 // go through all player relations
259 for( playerRelationIt = m_map.begin(); playerRelationIt != m_map.end(); ++playerRelationIt )
260 {
261
262 // write player index
263 playerIndex = (*playerRelationIt).first;
264 xfer->xferInt( &playerIndex );
265
266 // write relationship
267 r = (*playerRelationIt).second;
268 xfer->xferUser( &r, sizeof( Relationship ) );
269
270 } // end for, playerRelationIt
271
272 } // end if, save
273 else
274 {
275
276 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < playerRelationCount; ++i )
277 {
278
279 // read player index
280 xfer->xferInt( &playerIndex );
281
282 // read relationship
283 xfer->xferUser( &r, sizeof( Relationship ) );
284
285 // assign relationship
286 m_map[ playerIndex ] = r;
287
288 } // end for, i
289
290 } // end else, load
291
292} // end xfer

300} // end loadPostProcess

313
314 m_upgradeList = NULL;
315 m_pBuildList = NULL;
316 m_ai = NULL;
317 m_resourceGatheringManager = NULL;
318 m_defaultTeam = NULL;
319 m_radarCount = 0;
320 m_disableProofRadarCount = 0;
321 m_radarDisabled = FALSE;
322 m_bombardBattlePlans = 0;
323 m_holdTheLineBattlePlans = 0;
324 m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans = 0;
325 m_tunnelSystem = NULL;
326 m_playerTemplate = NULL;
327 m_battlePlanBonuses = NULL;
328 m_skillPointsModifier = 1.0f;
329 //Added By Sadullah
330 //Initializations inserted
331 m_canBuildUnits = TRUE;
332 m_canBuildBase = TRUE;
333 m_cashBountyPercent = 0.0f;
334 m_color = 0;
335 m_currentSelection = NULL;
336 m_rankLevel = 0;

338 m_side = 0;
339 m_baseSide = 0;

359//=============================================================================
360void Player::init(const PlayerTemplate* pt)
361{
362
363 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_playerTeamPrototypes.size() == 0, ("Player::m_playerTeamPrototypes is not empty at game start!\n"));
364 m_skillPointsModifier = 1.0f;
365 m_attackedFrame = 0;
366
367 m_isPreorder = FALSE;
368 m_isPlayerDead = FALSE;
369
370 m_radarCount = 0;
371 m_disableProofRadarCount = 0;
372 m_radarDisabled = FALSE;
373
374 m_bombardBattlePlans = 0;
375 m_holdTheLineBattlePlans = 0;
376 m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans = 0;
377 if( m_battlePlanBonuses )
378 {
379 m_battlePlanBonuses->deleteInstance();
380 m_battlePlanBonuses = NULL;
381 }
382
383 deleteUpgradeList();
384
385 m_energy.init(this);
386 m_stats.init();
387 if (m_pBuildList != NULL)
388 {
389 m_pBuildList->deleteInstance();
390 m_pBuildList = NULL;
391 }
392 m_defaultTeam = NULL;
393
394 if (m_ai)
395 {
396 m_ai->deleteInstance();
397 }
398 m_ai = NULL;
399
400 if( m_resourceGatheringManager )
401 {
402 m_resourceGatheringManager->deleteInstance();
403 m_resourceGatheringManager = NULL;
404 }
405
406 for (Int i = 0; i < NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS; ++i) {
407 if (m_squads[i] != NULL) {
408 m_squads[i]->deleteInstance();
409 m_squads[i] = NULL;
410 }
411 m_squads[i] = newInstance(Squad);
412 }
413
414 if (m_currentSelection != NULL) {
415 m_currentSelection->deleteInstance() ;
416 m_currentSelection = NULL;
417 }
418 m_currentSelection = newInstance(Squad);
419
420 if( m_tunnelSystem )
421 {
422 m_tunnelSystem->deleteInstance();
423 m_tunnelSystem = NULL;
424 }
425
426 m_canBuildBase = true;
427 m_canBuildUnits = true;
428 m_observer = false;
429 m_cashBountyPercent = 0.0f;
430 m_listInScoreScreen = TRUE;
431
432 m_unitsShouldHunt = FALSE;
433
434#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
435 m_DEMO_ignorePrereqs = FALSE;
436 m_DEMO_freeBuild = FALSE;
437#endif
438
439#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL) || defined(_ALLOW_DEBUG_CHEATS_IN_RELEASE)
440 m_DEMO_instantBuild = FALSE;
441#endif
442
443 if (pt)
444 {
445 m_side = pt->getSide();
446 m_baseSide = pt->getBaseSide();
447 m_productionCostChanges = pt->getProductionCostChanges();
448 m_productionTimeChanges = pt->getProductionTimeChanges();
449 m_productionVeterancyLevels = pt->getProductionVeterancyLevels();
450 m_color = pt->getPreferredColor()->getAsInt() | 0xff000000;
451 m_nightColor = m_color;
452
453 m_money = *pt->getMoney();
454 m_money.setPlayerIndex(getPlayerIndex());
455
456 m_handicap = *pt->getHandicap();
457
458 if( m_money.countMoney() == 0 )
459 {
460 if ( TheGameInfo )
461 {
462 m_money = TheGameInfo->getStartingCash();
463 }
464 else
465 {
466 m_money = TheGlobalData->m_defaultStartingCash;
467 }
468 }
469
470 m_playerDisplayName.clear();
471 m_playerName.clear();
472 m_playerNameKey = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
473 m_playerType = PLAYER_COMPUTER;
474 m_observer = pt->isObserver();
475 m_isPlayerDead = m_observer; // observers are dead
476
477 }
478 else
479 {
480 // no player template? must be the neutral player!
481 m_side = "";
482 m_baseSide = "";
483 m_productionCostChanges.clear();
484 m_productionTimeChanges.clear();
485 m_productionVeterancyLevels.clear();
486 m_color = NEUTRAL_PLAYER_COLOR;
487 m_nightColor = NEUTRAL_PLAYER_COLOR;
488 m_money.init();
489 m_handicap.init();
490
491 m_playerDisplayName = UnicodeString::TheEmptyString;
492 m_playerName = AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
493 m_playerNameKey = NAMEKEY(AsciiString::TheEmptyString);
494 m_playerType = PLAYER_COMPUTER;
495
496 // neutral is always "allied" with self -- this is the only thing ever allied with neutral!
497 setPlayerRelationship(this, ALLIES);
498
499 }
500 // reset each player
501 m_scoreKeeper.reset(m_playerIndex);
502 m_playerTemplate = pt;
503
504 // reset rank info
505 resetRank();
506 m_sciencesDisabled.clear();
507 m_sciencesHidden.clear();
508
509 {
510 SpecialPowerReadyTimerListIterator it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.begin();
511 while(it != m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.end())
512 {
513 SpecialPowerReadyTimerType *sprt = &(*it);
514 it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.erase( it );
515 if(sprt)
516 sprt->clear();
517 }
518 }
519
520 KindOfPercentProductionChangeListIt it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.begin();
521 while(it != m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.end())
522 {
523 KindOfPercentProductionChange *tof = *it;
524 it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.erase( it );
525 if(tof)
526 tof->deleteInstance();
527 }
528
529 getAcademyStats()->init( this );
530
531 //Always off at the beginning of a game! Only GameLogic::update has
532 //the power to turn it on. Don't want to cause desyncs!
533 m_logicalRetaliationModeEnabled = FALSE;
534}
535
536//=============================================================================
537Player::~Player()
538{
539 m_defaultTeam = NULL;
540 m_playerTemplate = NULL;
541
542 for( PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
543 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
544 {
545 (*it)->friend_setOwningPlayer(NULL);
546 }
547 m_playerTeamPrototypes.clear(); // empty, but don't free the contents
548
549 // delete the relation maps (the destructor clears the actual map if any data is present)
550 m_teamRelations->deleteInstance();
551 m_playerRelations->deleteInstance();
552
553 for (Int i = 0; i < NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS; ++i) {
554 if (m_squads[i] != NULL) {
555 m_squads[i]->deleteInstance();
556 m_squads[i] = NULL;
557 }
558 }
559
560 if (m_currentSelection != NULL) {
561 m_currentSelection->deleteInstance();
562 m_currentSelection = NULL;
563 }
564
565 if( m_battlePlanBonuses )
566 {
567 m_battlePlanBonuses->deleteInstance();
568 m_battlePlanBonuses = NULL;
569 }
570}

572//=============================================================================
573//DECLARE_PERF_TIMER(Player_getRelationship)
574Relationship Player::getRelationship(const Team *that) const
575{
576 //USE_PERF_TIMER(Player_getRelationship)
577 if (that)
578 {
579 // do we have an override for that particular team? if so, return it.
580 if (!m_teamRelations->m_map.empty())
581 {
582 TeamRelationMapType::const_iterator it = m_teamRelations->m_map.find(that->getID());
583 if (it != m_teamRelations->m_map.end())
584 {
585 return (*it).second;
586 }
587 }
588
589 // hummm... well, do we have something for that team's player?
590 if (!m_playerRelations->m_map.empty())
591 {
592 const Player* thatPlayer = that->getControllingPlayer();
593 if (thatPlayer != NULL)
594 {
595 PlayerRelationMapType::const_iterator it = m_playerRelations->m_map.find(thatPlayer->getPlayerIndex());
596 if (it != m_playerRelations->m_map.end())
597 {
598 return (*it).second;
599 }
600 }
601 }
602 }
603 return NEUTRAL;
604}
605
606//=============================================================================
607void Player::setPlayerRelationship(const Player *that, Relationship r)
608{
609 if (that != NULL)
610 {
611 // note that this creates the entry if it doesn't exist.
612 m_playerRelations->m_map[that->getPlayerIndex()] = r;
613 }
614}
615
616// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
617Bool Player::removePlayerRelationship(const Player *that)
618{
619 if (!m_playerRelations->m_map.empty())
620 {
621 if (that == NULL)
622 {
623 m_playerRelations->m_map.clear();
624 return true;
625 }
626 else
627 {
628 PlayerRelationMapType::iterator it = m_playerRelations->m_map.find(that->getPlayerIndex());
629 if (it != m_playerRelations->m_map.end())
630 {
631 m_playerRelations->m_map.erase(it);
632 return true;
633 }
634 }
635 }
636 return false;
637}
638
639//=============================================================================
640void Player::setTeamRelationship(const Team *that, Relationship r)
641{
642 if (that != NULL)
643 {
644 // note that this creates the entry if it doesn't exist.
645 m_teamRelations->m_map[that->getID()] = r;
646 }
647}
648
649// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
650Bool Player::removeTeamRelationship(const Team *that)
651{
652 if (!m_teamRelations->m_map.empty())
653 {
654 if (that == NULL)
655 {
656 m_teamRelations->m_map.clear();
657 return true;
658 }
659 else
660 {
661 TeamRelationMapType::iterator it = m_teamRelations->m_map.find(that->getID());
662 if (it != m_teamRelations->m_map.end())
663 {
664 m_teamRelations->m_map.erase(it);
665 return true;
666 }
667 }
668 }
669 return false;
670}

684//=============================================================================
685void Player::addToBuildList(Object *obj)
686{
687 BuildListInfo *newInfo = newInstance( BuildListInfo );
688 newInfo->setObjectID(obj->getID());
689 newInfo->setTemplateName(obj->getTemplate()->getName());
690 newInfo->setLocation(*obj->getPosition());
691 newInfo->setAngle(obj->getOrientation());
692 newInfo->setNumRebuilds(0); // Can't rebuild.
693 newInfo->setNextBuildList(m_pBuildList);
694 m_pBuildList = newInfo;
695}

697//=============================================================================
698void Player::addToPriorityBuildList(AsciiString templateName, Coord3D *pos, Real angle)
699{
700 BuildListInfo *newInfo = newInstance( BuildListInfo );
701 newInfo->setTemplateName(templateName);
702 newInfo->setLocation(*pos);
703 newInfo->setAngle(angle);
704 newInfo->markPriorityBuild();
705 newInfo->setNumRebuilds(1); // Build once.
706 newInfo->setNextBuildList(m_pBuildList);
707 m_pBuildList = newInfo;
708}
709
710//=============================================================================
711void Player::update()
712{
713 if (m_ai)
714 m_ai->update();
715
716 // Allow the teams this player owns to update themselves.
717 for( PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin(); it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it )
718 {
719 for( DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
720 {
721 Team *team = iter.cur();
722 if( !team )
723 {
724 continue;
725 }
726 team->updateGenericScripts();
727 }
728 }
729
730 if( m_energy.getPowerSabotagedTillFrame() != 0 && TheGameLogic->getFrame() > m_energy.getPowerSabotagedTillFrame() )
731 {
732 m_energy.setPowerSabotagedTillFrame( 0 ); //Tells us we're no longer sabotaged for above check.
733 onPowerBrownOutChange( !m_energy.hasSufficientPower() );
734 }
735
736 //Update the academy stats (this only checks applicable things that require a polling method)
737 getAcademyStats()->update();
738
739 //Kris: August 25, 2003 (DAY OF CODE LOCK -- NO NEW FEATURES, REALLY!)
740 if( ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer() == this )
741 {
742 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
743 //Only check and post the message once every second so we don't spam the message stream to account for lag.
744 if( now % LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND == 0 )
745 {
746 if( TheGlobalData->m_clientRetaliationModeEnabled != isLogicalRetaliationModeEnabled() )
747 {
748 //Post a logical message that will switch the retaliation mode on or off.
749 GameMessage *msg = TheMessageStream->appendMessage( GameMessage::MSG_ENABLE_RETALIATION_MODE );
750 if( msg )
751 {
752 msg->appendIntegerArgument( getPlayerIndex() );
753 msg->appendBooleanArgument( TheGlobalData->m_clientRetaliationModeEnabled );
754 }
755 }
756 }
757 }
758}

764 m_ai->newMap();
765}

767//=============================================================================
768void Player::setPlayerType(PlayerType t, Bool skirmish)
769{
770 m_playerType = t;
771
772 if (m_ai)
773 {
774 m_ai->deleteInstance();
775 }
776 m_ai = NULL;
777
778 if (t == PLAYER_COMPUTER)
779 {
780 if (skirmish || TheAI->getAiData()->m_forceSkirmishAI) {
781 // create AIPlayer and attach to this Player
782 m_ai = newInstance(AISkirmishPlayer)( this );
783 } else {
784 // create AIPlayer and attach to this Player
785 m_ai = newInstance(AIPlayer)( this );
786 }
787 }
788}

790//=============================================================================
791// This is called from PlayerList->newGame()
792//
793void Player::setDefaultTeam(void) {
794 AsciiString tname;
795 tname.set("team");
796 tname.concat(m_playerName);
797 Team *dt = TheTeamFactory->findTeam(tname);
798 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(dt, ("no team"));
799 if (dt) {
800 m_defaultTeam = dt;
801 dt->setActive();
802 }
803}

805//=============================================================================
806// This is called from PlayerList->newGame()
807//
808void Player::initFromDict(const Dict* d)
809{
810 AsciiString tmplname = d->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerFaction);
811 const PlayerTemplate* pt = ThePlayerTemplateStore->findPlayerTemplate(NAMEKEY(tmplname));
812 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(pt != NULL, ("PlayerTemplate %s not found -- this is an obsolete map (please open and resave in WB)\n",tmplname.str()));
813
814 init(pt);
815
816 m_playerDisplayName = d->getUnicodeString(TheKey_playerDisplayName);
817 AsciiString pname = d->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerName);
818 m_playerName = pname;
819 m_playerNameKey = NAMEKEY(pname);
820
821 Bool exists;
822 Bool skirmish = false;
823 Bool forceHuman = false;
824 if (d->getBool(TheKey_playerIsSkirmish, &exists))
825 {
826
827 // srj sez: check to ensure the map actually has a skirmish player... ordinarily it should, but
828 // poorly-formed user maps might not, which would be bad, and could crash us later. so if it doesn't
829 // actually have a skirmish player defined for this side, declare it nonskirmish... the player won't
830 // really work, but it's better than crashing.
831 for (Int spIdx = 0; spIdx < TheSidesList->getNumSkirmishSides(); ++spIdx)
832 {
833 AsciiString spTemplateName = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(spIdx)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerFaction);
834 const PlayerTemplate* spt = ThePlayerTemplateStore->findPlayerTemplate(NAMEKEY(spTemplateName));
835 if (spt && spt->getSide() == getSide())
836 {
837 skirmish = true;
838 break;
839 }
840 }
841
842 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(skirmish, ("Could not find skirmish player for side %s... quietly making into nonskirmish.", getSide().str()));
843 if (!skirmish)
844 forceHuman = true;
845
846 }
847
848 if (d->getBool(TheKey_playerIsHuman) || forceHuman)
849 {
850 setPlayerType(PLAYER_HUMAN, false);
851 if (d->getBool(TheKey_playerIsPreorder, &exists))
852 {
853 m_isPreorder = TRUE;
854 }
855 if (TheSidesList->getNumSkirmishSides()>0) {
856 // Human player gets scripts from CIVILIAN player.
857 AsciiString mySide = "Civilian";
858 Int i;
859 Bool found = false;
860 AsciiString qualTemplatePlayerName;
861 for (i=0; i<TheSidesList->getNumSkirmishSides(); i++) {
862 AsciiString templateName = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerFaction);
863 pt = ThePlayerTemplateStore->findPlayerTemplate(NAMEKEY(templateName));
864 if (pt && pt->getSide() == mySide) {
865 qualTemplatePlayerName.format("%s%d", TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerName).str(), m_mpStartIndex);
866 found = true;
867 break;
868 }
869 }
870 if (found && TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->getScriptList()) {
871 AsciiString qualifier;
872 qualifier.format("%d", m_mpStartIndex);
873
874 ScriptList *scripts = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->getScriptList()->duplicateAndQualify(
875 qualifier, qualTemplatePlayerName, pname);
876 if (TheSidesList->getSideInfo(getPlayerIndex())->getScriptList()) {
877 TheSidesList->getSideInfo(getPlayerIndex())->getScriptList()->deleteInstance();
878 }
879 TheSidesList->getSideInfo(getPlayerIndex())->setScriptList(scripts);
880 TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->getScriptList()->deleteInstance();
881 TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(i)->setScriptList(NULL);
882 }
883
884 }
885 skirmish = false;
886 }
887 else
888 {
889 setPlayerType(PLAYER_COMPUTER, skirmish);
890 }
891 m_mpStartIndex = d->getInt(TheKey_multiplayerStartIndex, &exists);
892 if (skirmish) {
893 // Copy and qualify scripts, and teams.
894
895 AsciiString mySide = getSide();
896 Int i, skirmishNdx;
897 Bool found = false;
898 AsciiString qualTemplatePlayerName;
899 for (skirmishNdx=0; skirmishNdx<TheSidesList->getNumSkirmishSides(); skirmishNdx++) {
900 AsciiString templateName = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(skirmishNdx)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerFaction);
901 pt = ThePlayerTemplateStore->findPlayerTemplate(NAMEKEY(templateName));
902 if (pt && pt->getSide() == mySide) {
903 qualTemplatePlayerName.format("%s%d", TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(skirmishNdx)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerName).str(), m_mpStartIndex);
904 found = true;
905 break;
906 }
907 }
908 Int diffInt = d->getInt(TheKey_skirmishDifficulty, &exists);
909 GameDifficulty difficulty = TheScriptEngine->getGlobalDifficulty();
910 if (exists)
911 {
912 difficulty = (GameDifficulty) diffInt;
913 }
914 if (m_ai)
915 {
916 m_ai->setAIDifficulty(difficulty);
917 }
918
919 if (!found)
920 {
921 DEBUG_CRASH(("Could not find skirmish player for side %s", mySide.str()));
922 } else {
923 m_playerName = qualTemplatePlayerName;
924 AsciiString qualifier;
925 qualifier.format("%d", m_mpStartIndex);
926 ScriptList *scripts = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(skirmishNdx)->getScriptList()->duplicateAndQualify(
927 qualifier, qualTemplatePlayerName, pname);
928 ScriptList* slist = TheSidesList->getSideInfo(getPlayerIndex())->getScriptList();
929 if (slist)
930 {
931 slist->deleteInstance();
932 }
933 TheSidesList->getSideInfo(getPlayerIndex())->setScriptList(scripts);
934 for (i=0; i<TheSidesList->getNumTeams(); i++) {
935 if (TheSidesList->getTeamInfo(i)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_teamOwner) == pname)
936 {
937 // Remove any teams in this player.
938 TheSidesList->removeTeam(i);
939 i--;
940 }
941 }
942 // Now add teams.
943
944 AsciiString originalPlayerName = TheSidesList->getSkirmishSideInfo(skirmishNdx)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_playerName);
945 for (i=0; i<TheSidesList->getNumSkirmishTeams(); i++) {
946 if (TheSidesList->getSkirmishTeamInfo(i)->getDict()->getAsciiString(TheKey_teamOwner) == originalPlayerName)
947 {
948 Dict teamDict(*TheSidesList->getSkirmishTeamInfo(i)->getDict());
949 AsciiString teamName = teamDict.getAsciiString(TheKey_teamName);
950 AsciiString newName;
951 newName.format("%s%d", teamDict.getAsciiString(TheKey_teamName).str(), m_mpStartIndex);
952
953 if (TheSidesList->findTeamInfo(newName)) continue;
954 teamDict.setAsciiString(TheKey_teamOwner, pname);
955 teamDict.setAsciiString(TheKey_teamName, newName);
956 // qualify scripts.
957
958 NameKeyType nameKeys[] =
959 {
960 TheKey_teamOnCreateScript,
961 TheKey_teamOnIdleScript,
962 TheKey_teamOnUnitDestroyedScript,
963 TheKey_teamOnDestroyedScript,
964 TheKey_teamEnemySightedScript,
965 TheKey_teamAllClearScript,
966 TheKey_teamProductionCondition
967 };
968
969 Int j;
970 const Int numKeys = sizeof(nameKeys) / sizeof(NameKeyType);
971 AsciiString tmpStr;
972 for (j = 0; j < numKeys; ++j)
973 {
974 tmpStr = teamDict.getAsciiString(nameKeys[j], &exists);
975 if (exists && !tmpStr.isEmpty())
976 {
977 newName.format("%s%d", tmpStr.str(), m_mpStartIndex);
978 teamDict.setAsciiString(nameKeys[j], newName);
979 }
980 }
981
982 // Now do the TheKey_teamGenericScriptHookN (where N can be from 0 to 15.)
983 for (j = 0; j < MAX_GENERIC_SCRIPTS; ++j) {
984 AsciiString keyName;
985 keyName.format("%s%d", TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(TheKey_teamGenericScriptHook).str(), j);
986 tmpStr = teamDict.getAsciiString(NAMEKEY(keyName), &exists);
987 if (exists && !tmpStr.isEmpty())
988 {
989 newName.format("%s%d", tmpStr.str(), m_mpStartIndex);
990 teamDict.setAsciiString(NAMEKEY(keyName), newName);
991 }
992 }
993
994 // Done. Now add the team.
995 TheSidesList->addTeam(&teamDict);
996 }
997 }
998 }
999 }
1000 if( m_resourceGatheringManager )
1001 {
1002 m_resourceGatheringManager->deleteInstance();
1003 m_resourceGatheringManager = NULL;
1004 }
1005 m_resourceGatheringManager = newInstance(ResourceGatheringManager);
1006
1007 if( m_tunnelSystem )
1008 {
1009 m_tunnelSystem->deleteInstance();
1010 m_tunnelSystem = NULL;
1011 }
1012 m_tunnelSystem = newInstance(TunnelTracker);
1013
1014 m_handicap.readFromDict(d);
1015
1017 m_playerRelations->m_map.clear(); // For now, it has been decided to just fix this one. Dear god me must reset.
1018 m_teamRelations->m_map.clear(); // For now, it has been decided to just fix this one. Dear god me must reset.
1019
1020 Int i;
1021 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYER_COUNT; ++i ) // For now, it has been decided to just fix this one. Dear god me must reset.
1022 {
1023 m_attackedBy[i] = false;
1024 }
1025
1026 Int c = d->getInt(TheKey_playerColor, &exists);
1027 if (exists)
1028 {
1029 m_color = c | 0xff000000;
1030 m_nightColor = m_color;
1031 }
1032
1033 c = d->getInt(TheKey_playerNightColor, &exists);
1034 if (exists)
1035 {
1036 m_nightColor = c | 0xff000000;
1037 }
1038
1039 Int m = d->getInt(TheKey_playerStartMoney, &exists);
1040 if (exists)
1041 m_money.deposit(m);
1042
1043 for ( i = 0; i < NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS; ++i ) {
1044 if (m_squads[i] != NULL)
1045 {
1046 m_squads[i]->deleteInstance();
1047 m_squads[i] = NULL;
1048 }
1049 m_squads[i] = newInstance( Squad );
1050 }
1051
1052 if (m_currentSelection != NULL) {
1053 m_currentSelection->deleteInstance();
1054 m_currentSelection = NULL;
1055 }
1056 m_currentSelection = newInstance( Squad );
1057}
1058
1059//=============================================================================
1060void Player::becomingTeamMember(Object *obj, Bool yes)
1061{
1062 if (!obj)
1063 return;
1064
1065 // energy production/consumption hooks, note we ignore things that are UNDER_CONSTRUCTION
1066 if( !obj->getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
1067 {
1068 obj->friend_adjustPowerForPlayer(yes);
1069 } // end if
1070
1071 // when we capture a building, we need to see if there's an AutoDepositUpdate hooked to it,
1072 // if so, award the cash bonus
1073 if(this != ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer() && yes)
1074 {
1075 NameKeyType key_AutoDepositUpdate = NAMEKEY("AutoDepositUpdate");
1076 AutoDepositUpdate *adu = (AutoDepositUpdate *)obj->findUpdateModule(key_AutoDepositUpdate);
1077 if (adu != NULL) {
1078 adu->awardInitialCaptureBonus( this );
1079 }
1080 }
1081
1082 if( getNumBattlePlansActive() > 0 && obj->areModulesReady() )
1083 {
1084 if( yes )
1085 {
1086 //We are entering a team with active battle plans so add it's bonuses now
1087 applyBattlePlanBonusesForObject( obj );
1088 }
1089 else
1090 {
1091 //We are leaving a team with active battle plans so remove them now.
1092 removeBattlePlanBonusesForObject( obj );
1093 }
1094 }
1095
1096
1097 if (obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER)
1098 && obj->getAIUpdateInterface()
1099 && obj->getAIUpdateInterface()->isIdle())
1100 {
1101 // Need to remove it from the pick a peasant button
1102 if (yes)
1103 TheInGameUI->addIdleWorker(obj);
1104 else
1105 TheInGameUI->removeIdleWorker(obj, getPlayerIndex());
1106 }
1107}
1108
1109//=============================================================================
1110void Player::becomingLocalPlayer(Bool yes)
1111{
1112 if (yes)
1113 {
1114 // This changes the color of the little dot on the upper right side of the screen indicating
1115 // which team is under control.
1116 if( TheGameClient )
1117 {
1118 RGBColor rgb;
1119 rgb.setFromInt(m_color);
1120 TheGameClient->setTeamColor(REAL_TO_INT(rgb.red*255), REAL_TO_INT(rgb.green*255), REAL_TO_INT(rgb.blue*255));
1121 }
1122
1123 if( ThePartitionManager )
1124 {
1125 ObjectIterator *iter = ThePartitionManager->iterateAllObjects();
1126 for( Object* object = iter->first(); object; object = iter->next() )
1127 {
1128 // Added support for updating the perceptions of garrisoned buildings containing enemy stealth units.
1129 // When changing teams, it is necessary to update this information.
1130 ContainModuleInterface *contain = object->getContain();
1131 if( contain )
1132 {
1133 contain->recalcApparentControllingPlayer();
1134 TheRadar->removeObject( object );
1135 TheRadar->addObject( object );
1136 }
1137
1138 if( object->isKindOf( KINDOF_DISGUISER ) )
1139 {
1140 //KM -- August 2002:
1141 //Added support for disguised objects, based on relationships, we either show the real color or the disguised color.
1142 Drawable *draw = object->getDrawable();
1143 if( draw )
1144 {
1145
1146 StealthUpdate *update = object->getStealth();
1147
1148 if( update && update->isDisguised() )
1149 {
1150 Player *disguisedPlayer = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer( update->getDisguisedPlayerIndex() );
1151 if( getRelationship( object->getTeam() ) != ALLIES && isPlayerActive() )
1152 {
1153 //Neutrals and enemies will see this disguised unit as the team it's disguised as.
1154 if (TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT)
1155 draw->setIndicatorColor( disguisedPlayer->getPlayerNightColor());
1156 else
1157 draw->setIndicatorColor( disguisedPlayer->getPlayerColor() );
1158 }
1159 else
1160 {
1161 //Otherwise, the color will show up as the team it really belongs to.
1162 if (TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT)
1163 draw->setIndicatorColor(object->getNightIndicatorColor());
1164 else
1165 draw->setIndicatorColor( object->getIndicatorColor() );
1166 }
1167 TheRadar->removeObject( object );
1168 TheRadar->addObject( object );
1169 }
1170 }
1171 }
1172 }
1173 iter->deleteInstance();
1174 }
1175
1176 if( TheControlBar )
1177 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();
1178 }
1179 else
1180 {
1181 // nothing to do
1182 }
1183}

1214
1215//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1216// PlayerObjectFindInfo is used to find a player's object. For example, we iterate through
1217// to find a player's command center, or a specific building capable of firing the specified
1218// special power.
1219//
1220// if he has none, return null.
1221// if he has multiple, return one arbitrarily.
1222//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1223
1224//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1225// Iterator data struct
1226//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1227struct PlayerObjectFindInfo
1228{
1229 Player* player;
1230 Object* obj;
1231 SpecialPowerType spType;
1232 const ThingTemplate *thing;
1233 UnsignedInt lowestReadyFrame;
1234 UnsignedInt highestPercentage;
1235 UnsignedInt numReady;
1236};
1237
1238//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1239// Iterator function
1240// Find the first available command center that is naturally ours (not captured from enemy).
1241//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1242static void doFindCommandCenter(Object* obj, void* userData)
1243{
1244 if (!obj)
1245 return;
1246
1247 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1248
1249 if (info->obj == NULL
1250 && obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_COMMANDCENTER)
1251 && obj->getTemplate()->getDefaultOwningSide() == info->player->getSide()
1252 && !obj->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION)
1253 && !obj->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD))
1254 {
1255 info->obj = obj;
1256 }
1257}
1258
1259//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1260// Iterator function
1261// Find first object capable of firing specified special power right now.
1262//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1263static void doFindSpecialPowerSourceObject( Object *obj, void *userData )
1264{
1265 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1266
1267 if( info->lowestReadyFrame == 0 )
1268 {
1269 //We already found the best case scenario, so no need to iterate any more.
1270 return;
1271 }
1272 if( !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION )
1273 && !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD )
1274 && !obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
1275 {
1276 if( info->spType == SPECIAL_INVALID && obj->hasAnySpecialPower() )
1277 {
1278 //We just care about find an object that has *any* shortcut capable special power.
1279 //Iterate through the special power modules and look for one.
1280 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *spmInterface = obj->findAnyShortcutSpecialPowerModuleInterface();
1281 if( spmInterface && !spmInterface->isScriptOnly() )
1282 {
1283 info->obj = obj;
1284 info->lowestReadyFrame = 0;
1285 return;
1286 }
1287 }
1288 else if( obj->hasSpecialPower( info->spType ) )
1289 {
1290 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *spmInterface = obj->findSpecialPowerModuleInterface( info->spType );
1291 if( spmInterface && !spmInterface->isScriptOnly() )
1292 {
1293 UnsignedInt readyFrame = spmInterface->getReadyFrame();
1294
1295#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL) || defined(_ALLOW_DEBUG_CHEATS_IN_RELEASE)
1296 // Everything is ready if timers are debug off'd
1297 if( ! TheGlobalData->m_specialPowerUsesDelay )
1298 readyFrame = 0;
1299#endif
1300 // A disabled guy should only be considered as a last resort. We need it to be counted
1301 // so that a disabled button can appear on the shortcut.
1302 if( obj->isDisabled() )
1303 readyFrame = UINT_MAX - 10;
1304
1305 if( readyFrame < TheGameLogic->getFrame())
1306 {
1307 //This special power is ready now and matches, so simply return the
1308 //first one.
1309 info->obj = obj;
1310 info->lowestReadyFrame = 0;
1311 return;
1312 }
1313 else if( readyFrame < info->lowestReadyFrame )
1314 {
1315 //This special power isn't ready, but it is going to be ready sooner than any others
1316 //we checked (or it's the first one we checked).
1317 info->obj = obj;
1318 info->lowestReadyFrame = readyFrame;
1319 return;
1320 }
1321 }
1322 }
1323 }
1324}
1325
1326//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1327// Iterator function
1328// Count number of specified special powers that are ready to fire now.
1329//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1330static void doCountSpecialPowersReady( Object *obj, void *userData )
1331{
1332 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1333
1334 if( !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION )
1335 && !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD )
1336 && !obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
1337 {
1338 if( obj->hasSpecialPower( info->spType ) )
1339 {
1340 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *spmInterface = obj->findSpecialPowerModuleInterface( info->spType );
1341 if( spmInterface && !spmInterface->isScriptOnly() )
1342 {
1343
1344 if( spmInterface->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->isSharedNSync() && info->numReady == 1 )
1345 {
1346 //Shared powers don't stack after the first one is counted.
1347 return;
1348 }
1349
1350 UnsignedInt readyFrame = spmInterface->getReadyFrame();
1351
1352#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL) || defined(_ALLOW_DEBUG_CHEATS_IN_RELEASE)
1353 // Everything is ready if timers are debug off'd
1354 if( ! TheGlobalData->m_specialPowerUsesDelay )
1355 readyFrame = 0;
1356#endif
1357
1358 // A disabled guy should only be considered as a last resort. We do not want him counted here
1359 // so that Disabled guys do not go in to the number on the shortcut button.
1360 if( obj->isDisabled() )
1361 readyFrame = UINT_MAX - 10;
1362
1363 if( readyFrame < TheGameLogic->getFrame())
1364 {
1365 //This special power is ready now and matches, so simply return the
1366 //first one.
1367 info->numReady++;
1368 }
1369 }
1370 }
1371 }
1372}
1373
1374//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1375static void doFindMostReadyWeaponForThing( Object *obj, void *userData )
1376{
1377 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1378
1379 if( info->highestPercentage >= 100 )
1380 {
1381 //We already found the best case scenario, so no need to iterate any more.
1382 return;
1383 }
1384
1385 if( info->thing->isEquivalentTo( obj->getTemplate() ) )
1386 {
1387 if( !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION )
1388 && !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD )
1389 && !obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
1390 {
1391 if( obj->hasAnyWeapon() )
1392 {
1393 UnsignedInt percentage = obj->getMostPercentReadyToFireAnyWeapon();
1394 if( percentage > info->highestPercentage )
1395 {
1396 //This weapon is more ready than any others we've checked.
1397 info->obj = obj;
1398 info->highestPercentage = percentage;
1399 return;
1400 }
1401 }
1402 }
1403 }
1404}
1405
1406//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1407static void doFindMostReadySpecialPowerForThing( Object *obj, void *userData )
1408{
1409 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1410
1411 if( info->highestPercentage >= 100 )
1412 {
1413 //We already found the best case scenario, so no need to iterate any more.
1414 return;
1415 }
1416
1417 if( info->thing->isEquivalentTo( obj->getTemplate() ) )
1418 {
1419 if( !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION )
1420 && !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD )
1421 && !obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
1422 {
1423 // search the modules for the one with the matching template
1424 for( BehaviorModule** m = obj->getBehaviorModules(); *m; ++m )
1425 {
1426 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
1427 if (!sp)
1428 continue;
1429
1430 UnsignedInt percentage = sp->getPercentReady();
1431 if( percentage > info->highestPercentage )
1432 {
1433 //This weapon is more ready than any others we've checked.
1434 info->obj = obj;
1435 info->highestPercentage = percentage;
1436 }
1437 }
1438 }
1439 }
1440}
1441
1442//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1443static void doFindExistingObjectWithThingTemplate( Object *obj, void *userData )
1444{
1445 PlayerObjectFindInfo* info = (PlayerObjectFindInfo*)userData;
1446
1447 if( info->obj )
1448 {
1449 //We already found a matching obj, so return
1450 return;
1451 }
1452
1453 if( info->thing->isEquivalentTo( obj->getTemplate() ) )
1454 {
1455 if( !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION )
1456 && !obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD )
1457 && !obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
1458 {
1459 //We found one.
1460 info->obj = obj;
1461 }
1462 }
1463}
1464
1465//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1466Object* Player::findNaturalCommandCenter()
1467{
1468 PlayerObjectFindInfo info;
1469 info.player = this;
1470 info.obj = NULL;
1471 iterateObjects(doFindCommandCenter, &info);
1472 return info.obj;

1665//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1667//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1668void Player::onStructureConstructionComplete( Object *builder, Object *structure, Bool isRebuild )
1669{
1670 // When a a structure is completed, it becomes "real" as far as scripting is
1671 // concerned. jba.
1672 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfObjectCreationOrDestruction();
1673
1674 // Update the pathfind footprint. Sometimes when rubble has to be removed
1675 // to build, the initial footprint while building is goofy. jba.
1676 TheAI->pathfinder()->removeObjectFromPathfindMap(structure);
1677 TheAI->pathfinder()->addObjectToPathfindMap(structure);
1678
1679 // increment our scorekeeper
1680 if (isRebuild == FALSE) {
1681 m_scoreKeeper.addObjectBuilt(structure);
1682 m_scoreKeeper.addMoneySpent(structure->getTemplate()->calcCostToBuild(this));
1683 }
1684
1685 structure->friend_adjustPowerForPlayer(TRUE);
1686
1687 // ai notification callback
1688 if( m_ai )
1689 m_ai->onStructureProduced( builder, structure );
1690
1691 // the GUI needs to re-evaluate the information being displayed to the user now
1692 if( TheControlBar )
1693 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();
1694
1695 // This object may require us to play some EVA sounds.
1696 Player *localPlayer = ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer();
1697
1698 if( structure->hasSpecialPower( SPECIAL_PARTICLE_UPLINK_CANNON ) ||
1699 structure->hasSpecialPower( SUPW_SPECIAL_PARTICLE_UPLINK_CANNON ) ||
1700 structure->hasSpecialPower( LAZR_SPECIAL_PARTICLE_UPLINK_CANNON ) )
1701 {
1702 if ( localPlayer == structure->getControllingPlayer() )
1703 {
1704 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Own_ParticleCannon);
1705 }
1706 else if ( localPlayer->getRelationship(structure->getTeam()) != ENEMIES )
1707 {
1708 // Note: treating NEUTRAL as ally. Is this correct?
1709 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Ally_ParticleCannon);
1710 }
1711 else
1712 {
1713 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Enemy_ParticleCannon);
1714 }
1715 }
1716
1717 if( structure->hasSpecialPower( SPECIAL_NEUTRON_MISSILE ) ||
1718 structure->hasSpecialPower( NUKE_SPECIAL_NEUTRON_MISSILE ) ||
1719 structure->hasSpecialPower( SUPW_SPECIAL_NEUTRON_MISSILE ) )
1720 {
1721 if ( localPlayer == structure->getControllingPlayer() )
1722 {
1723 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Own_Nuke);
1724 }
1725 else if ( localPlayer->getRelationship(structure->getTeam()) != ENEMIES )
1726 {
1727 // Note: treating NEUTRAL as ally. Is this correct?
1728 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Ally_Nuke);
1729 }
1730 else
1731 {
1732 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Enemy_Nuke);
1733 }
1734 }
1735
1736 if (structure->hasSpecialPower(SPECIAL_SCUD_STORM))
1737 {
1738 if ( localPlayer == structure->getControllingPlayer() )
1739 {
1740 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Own_ScudStorm);
1741 }
1742 else if ( localPlayer->getRelationship(structure->getTeam()) != ENEMIES )
1743 {
1744 // Note: treating NEUTRAL as ally. Is this correct?
1745 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Ally_ScudStorm);
1746 }
1747 else
1748 {
1749 TheEva->setShouldPlay(EVA_SuperweaponDetected_Enemy_ScudStorm);
1750 }
1751 }
1752} // end onStructureConstructionComplete
1753

1761void Player::addTeamToList(TeamPrototype* team)
1762{
1763 for( PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
1764 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it )
1765 {
1766 if (team == *it)
1767 return; // already present
1768 }
1769
1770 m_playerTeamPrototypes.push_back(team);
1771}

1773//=============================================================================
1774void Player::removeTeamFromList(TeamPrototype* team)
1775{
1776 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
1777 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
1778 {
1779 if (team == *it)
1780 {
1781 m_playerTeamPrototypes.erase(it);
1782 return;
1783 }
1784 }
1785}

2010//=============================================================================
2011void Player::setUnitsShouldHunt(Bool unitsShouldHunt, CommandSourceType source)
2012{
2013 m_unitsShouldHunt = unitsShouldHunt;
2014
2015 Coord3D pos;
2016 ThePartitionManager->getMostValuableLocation(getPlayerIndex(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, VOT_CashValue, &pos);
2017 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2018 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2019 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2020 Team *team = iter.cur();
2021 if (!team) {
2022 continue;
2023 }
2024
2025 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance()) {
2026 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2027 if (!obj) {
2028 continue;
2029 }
2030
2031 KindOfMaskType disqualifyingKindofs;
2032 disqualifyingKindofs.set(KINDOF_DOZER);
2033 disqualifyingKindofs.set(KINDOF_HARVESTER);
2034 disqualifyingKindofs.set(KINDOF_IGNORES_SELECT_ALL);
2035
2036 if (obj->isAnyKindOf( disqualifyingKindofs )) {
2037 continue; // Harvesters, dozers etc.
2038 }
2039
2040 obj->leaveGroup();
2041 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2042 if (ai) {
2043 if (unitsShouldHunt) {
2044 ai->aiHunt(source);
2045 } else {
2046 ai->aiIdle(source);
2047 }
2048 }
2049 }
2050 }
2051 }
2052}
2053
2054//=============================================================================
2055void Player::killPlayer(void)
2056{
2057 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin(); it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2058 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2059 Team *team = iter.cur();
2060 if (!team) {
2061 continue;
2062 }
2063 team->evacuateTeam(); // force containers on team to dump contents
2064 }
2065 }
2066
2067 m_isPlayerDead = TRUE; // this is so OCLs don't ever again spawn useful units for us.
2068
2069 for (it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin(); it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2070 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2071 Team *team = iter.cur();
2072 if (!team) {
2073 continue;
2074 }
2075 team->killTeam();
2076 }
2077 }
2078 if (TheGameLogic->isInSinglePlayerGame()) {
2079 if (getPlayerType()==PLAYER_COMPUTER) {
2080 // This is an AI player in a solo mission - leave him alive so he can be used later. jba.
2081 m_isPlayerDead = FALSE; // this is so we can later spawn useful units for us.
2082 return;
2083 }
2084 }
2085 if (isLocalPlayer() && !TheGameLogic->isInShellGame())
2086 {
2087 becomingLocalPlayer(TRUE); // recalc disguises, etc
2088 if (TheControlBar )
2089 {
2090 if (isPlayerActive())
2091 {
2092 TheControlBar->setControlBarSchemeByPlayer(this);
2093 }
2094 else
2095 {
2096 TheControlBar->setControlBarSchemeByPlayerTemplate(ThePlayerTemplateStore->findPlayerTemplate(NAMEKEY("FactionObserver")));
2097 }
2098 }
2099
2100 }
2101
2102 m_money.withdraw(m_money.countMoney()); // force $$$ to 0 on death
2103}
2104
2105//=============================================================================
2106void Player::setObjectsEnabled(AsciiString templateTypeToAffect, Bool enable)
2107{
2108 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2109 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2110 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2111 Team *team = iter.cur();
2112 if (!team) {
2113 continue;
2114 }
2115
2116 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance()) {
2117 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2118 if (!obj) {
2119 continue;
2120 }
2121
2122 if (obj->getTemplate()->getName().compare(templateTypeToAffect) == 0)
2123 {
2124 obj->setScriptStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_DISABLED, !enable );
2125 }
2126 }
2127 }
2128 }
2129}

2131//=============================================================================
2132void Player::transferAssetsFromThat(Player *that)
2133{
2134 Team *defaultTeam = getDefaultTeam();
2135 if (!defaultTeam) {
2136 return;
2137 }
2138
2139 std::list<Object *> objsToTransfer;
2140
2141 // let's not transfer beacons
2142 const ThingTemplate *beaconTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( that->getPlayerTemplate()->getBeaconTemplate() );
2143
2144 // transfer all his units.
2145 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = that->m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2146 it != that->m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
2147 {
2148 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2149 {
2150 Team *team = iter.cur();
2151 if (!team)
2152 {
2153 continue;
2154 }
2155
2156 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance())
2157 {
2158 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2159 if (!obj || obj->getTemplate()->isEquivalentTo(beaconTemplate)) // don't transfer NULL objs or beacons
2160 {
2161 continue;
2162 }
2163 objsToTransfer.push_back(obj);
2164 }
2165 }
2166 }
2167
2168 for (std::list<Object *>::iterator itObjs = objsToTransfer.begin(); itObjs != objsToTransfer.end(); ++itObjs) {
2169 (*itObjs)->setTeam(defaultTeam);
2170 }
2171
2172 // transfer all his money
2173 UnsignedInt allMoney = that->getMoney()->countMoney();
2174 that->getMoney()->withdraw(allMoney);
2175 getMoney()->deposit(allMoney);
2176}
2177
2178//=============================================================================
2179void Player::garrisonAllUnits(CommandSourceType source)
2180{
2181 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f1(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_STRUCTURE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
2182 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, NULL };
2183
2184 Coord3D pos = {50.0, 50.0, 50.0};
2186// test such a change... make someday
2187 ObjectIterator *iterBuilding = ThePartitionManager->iterateObjectsInRange(&pos, 1e9f, FROM_CENTER_3D, filters, ITER_SORTED_NEAR_TO_FAR);
2188 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold(iterBuilding);
2189
2190 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2191 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2192 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2193 Team *team = iter.cur();
2194 if (!team) {
2195 continue;
2196 }
2197
2198 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance()) {
2199 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2200 if (!obj) {
2201 continue;
2202 }
2203
2204 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2205 if (!ai) {
2206 continue;
2207 }
2208
2209 for (Object *theBuilding = iterBuilding->first(); theBuilding; theBuilding = iterBuilding->next())
2210 {
2211 ContainModuleInterface *contain = theBuilding->getContain();
2212 if (contain)
2213 {
2214 PlayerMaskType player = contain->getPlayerWhoEntered();
2215 if (!((player == 0) || (player == obj->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask()))) {
2216 continue;
2217 }
2218 }
2219 if( !TheActionManager->canEnterObject( obj, theBuilding, source, CHECK_CAPACITY ) )
2220 {
2221 continue;
2222 }
2223
2224 ai->aiEnter(theBuilding, source);
2225 }
2226 }
2227 }
2228 }
2229}
2230
2231//=============================================================================
2232void Player::ungarrisonAllUnits(CommandSourceType source)
2233{
2234 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2235 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it) {
2236 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2237 Team *team = iter.cur();
2238 if (!team) {
2239 continue;
2240 }
2241
2242 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance()) {
2243 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2244 if (!obj) {
2245 continue;
2246 }
2247
2248 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2249 if (!ai) {
2250 continue;
2251 }
2252
2253 // Tell everything that has stuff in it to kick them all out. You can't tell the people to get
2254 // out of what they are in, because they may not know, or they may be two transports deep, and their
2255 // transport may not know where they are.
2256 // And check for building so you don't unload transports in the ungarrison command
2257 if( obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_STRUCTURE ) )
2258 ai->aiEvacuate( FALSE, source);
2259 }
2260 }
2261 }
2262}
2263
2264
2265//=============================================================================
2266void Player::setUnitsShouldIdleOrResume(Bool idle)
2267{
2268 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2269 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
2270 {
2271 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2272 {
2273 Team *team = iter.cur();
2274 if (!team)
2275 continue;
2276
2277 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance())
2278 {
2279 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2280 if (!obj)
2281 continue;
2282
2283 if (obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE))
2284 continue;
2285
2286 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2287 if (!ai)
2288 continue;
2289
2290 if (idle)
2291 {
2292 // force it to move to its position to make it stop.
2293 ai->aiMoveToPosition(obj->getPosition(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
2294 }
2295 else
2296 {
2297 // Here is the special bit for this exit style, force wanting on SupplyTruck types
2298 if (ai->isIdle())
2299 {
2300 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = ai->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
2301 if( supplyTruckAI )
2302 supplyTruckAI->setForceWantingState(true);
2303 }
2304 }
2305 }
2306 }
2307 }
2308}

2431//=============================================================================
2432void Player::doBountyForKill(const Object* killer, const Object* victim)
2433{
2434 if (!killer || !victim)
2435 return;
2436
2437 // srj sez: per dustin, no experience (et al) for killing things under construction.
2438 if (victim->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION))
2439 return;
2440
2441 Int costToBuild = victim->getTemplate()->calcCostToBuild(victim->getControllingPlayer());
2442 Int bounty = REAL_TO_INT_CEIL(costToBuild * m_cashBountyPercent);
2443
2444 if( bounty )
2445 {
2446
2447 getMoney()->deposit( bounty );
2448 m_scoreKeeper.addMoneyEarned( bounty );
2449
2450 //Display cash income floating over the recipient.
2451 UnicodeString moneyString;
2452 moneyString.format( TheGameText->fetch( "GUI:AddCash" ), bounty );
2453 Coord3D pos;
2454 pos.zero();
2455 pos.add( killer->getPosition() );
2456 pos.z += 10.0f; //add a little z to make it show up above the unit.
2457 TheInGameUI->addFloatingText( moneyString, &pos, GameMakeColor( 255, 255, 0, 255 ) );
2458 }
2459}

2466
2467//=============================================================================
2469Bool Player::addSkillPoints(Int delta)
2470{
2471 delta = REAL_TO_INT_CEIL(m_skillPointsModifier * INT_TO_REAL(delta));
2472
2473 if( delta == 0 )
2474 return false;
2475
2476 Int levelCap = min( TheGameLogic->getRankLevelLimit(), TheRankInfoStore->getRankLevelCount() );
2477 Int pointCap = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(levelCap)->m_skillPointsNeeded; // Cap at lowest point of cap level, not highest.
2478
2479 Bool levelGained = FALSE;
2480 m_skillPoints = min( pointCap, (m_skillPoints + delta) );
2481 while( m_skillPoints >= m_levelUp )
2482 {
2483 // LevelUp gets increased as a side effect of setRankLevel, and this won't infinitely loop,
2484 // because when there are no more levels to be gained, m_levelUp is set to INT_MAX.
2485 setRankLevel( m_rankLevel + 1 );
2486 levelGained = TRUE;
2487 }
2488
2489 return levelGained;
2490}
2491
2492//=============================================================================
2494Bool Player::addSkillPointsForKill(const Object* killer, const Object* victim)
2495{
2496 if (!killer || !victim)
2497 return false;
2498
2499 // srj sez: per dustin, no experience (et al) for killing things under construction.
2500 if (victim->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION))
2501 return false;
2502
2503 Int victimLevel = victim->getVeterancyLevel();
2504 Int skillValue = victim->getTemplate()->getSkillPointValue(victimLevel);
2505
2506 return addSkillPoints(skillValue);
2507}

2509//=============================================================================
2510void Player::resetSciences()
2511{
2512 m_sciences.clear();
2513
2514 if (getPlayerTemplate())
2515 m_sciences = getPlayerTemplate()->getIntrinsicSciences();
2516
2517 for (Int i = 1; i <= m_rankLevel; ++i)
2518 {
2519 const RankInfo* rank = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(i);
2520 if (rank)
2521 {
2522 for (ScienceVec::const_iterator it = rank->m_sciencesGranted.begin(); it != rank->m_sciencesGranted.end(); ++it)
2523 {
2524 addScience(*it);
2525 }
2526 }
2527 }
2528
2529 for (ScienceVec::const_iterator it = m_sciences.begin(); it != m_sciences.end(); ++it)
2530 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfAcquiredScience(getPlayerIndex(), *it);
2531}
2532
2533//=============================================================================
2535Bool Player::addScience(ScienceType science)
2536{
2537 if (hasScience(science))
2538 return false;
2539
2540 //DEBUG_LOG(("Adding Science %s\n",TheScienceStore->getInternalNameForScience(science).str()));
2541
2542 m_sciences.push_back(science);
2543
2544 // 'wake up' any special powers controlled by, well, stuff
2545 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
2546 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
2547 {
2548 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2549 {
2550 Team *team = iter.cur();
2551 if (!team)
2552 continue;
2553
2554 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance())
2555 {
2556 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
2557 if (!obj)
2558 continue;
2559
2560 for (BehaviorModule** m = obj->getBehaviorModules(); *m; ++m)
2561 {
2562 SpecialPowerModuleInterface* sp = (*m)->getSpecialPower();
2563 if (!sp)
2564 continue;
2565
2566 if (sp->getRequiredScience() == science)
2567 {
2568 // Turn on the power, and set it to be instantly ready, because that is cool.
2569 sp->onSpecialPowerCreation();
2570 sp->setReadyFrame( TheGameLogic->getFrame() );
2571 }
2572 }
2573 }
2574 }
2575
2576 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();// Refresh the UI to show new cameos, etc
2577
2578 }
2579
2580 // notify the script engine
2581 TheScriptEngine->notifyOfAcquiredScience(getPlayerIndex(), science);
2582
2583 return true;
2584}

2586//=============================================================================
2587void Player::addSciencePurchasePoints(Int delta)
2588{
2589 //DEBUG_LOG(("Adding SciencePurchasePoints %d -> %d\n",m_sciencePurchasePoints,m_sciencePurchasePoints+delta));
2590 Int oldSPP = m_sciencePurchasePoints;
2591 m_sciencePurchasePoints += delta;
2592 if (m_sciencePurchasePoints < 0)
2593 m_sciencePurchasePoints = 0;
2594
2595 if (oldSPP != m_sciencePurchasePoints && TheControlBar != NULL)
2596 TheControlBar->onPlayerSciencePurchasePointsChanged(this);
2597
2598}

2600//=============================================================================
2601Bool Player::attemptToPurchaseScience(ScienceType science)
2602{
2603 if (!isCapableOfPurchasingScience(science))
2604 {
2605 DEBUG_CRASH(("isCapableOfPurchasingScience: need other prereqs/points to purchase, request is ignored!\n"));
2606 return false;
2607 }
2608
2609 Int cost = TheScienceStore->getSciencePurchaseCost(science);
2610 addSciencePurchasePoints(-cost);
2611 addScience(science);
2612
2613 getAcademyStats()->recordGeneralsPointsSpent( cost );
2614
2615 if( ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer() == this )
2616 {
2617 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();
2618 }
2619
2620 return true;
2621}

2627 {
2628 DEBUG_CRASH(("Cannot grant science %s, since it is marked as nonGrantable.\n",TheScienceStore->getInternalNameForScience(science).str()));
2629 return false; // it's not grantable, so tough, can't have it, even via this method.
2630 }
2631
2632 return addScience(science);
2633}
2634
2635//=============================================================================
2636Bool Player::isCapableOfPurchasingScience(ScienceType science) const
2637{
2638 if (science == SCIENCE_INVALID)
2639 {
2640 return false;
2641 }
2642
2643 if (hasScience(science))
2644 {
2645 return false;
2646 }
2647
2648 if( isScienceDisabled( science ) || isScienceHidden( science ) )
2649 {
2650 return false;
2651 }
2652
2653 if (!hasPrereqsForScience(science))
2654 {
2655 return false;
2656 }
2657
2658 Int cost = TheScienceStore->getSciencePurchaseCost(science);
2659 // purchase cost of zero means "not purchasable!"
2660 if (cost == 0 || cost > getSciencePurchasePoints())
2661 {
2662 return false;
2663 }
2664
2665 return true;
2666}

2668//=============================================================================
2669void Player::resetRank()
2670{
2671 m_rankLevel = 1;
2672 m_skillPoints = 0;
2673 const RankInfo* nextRank = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(m_rankLevel+1);
2674 m_levelUp = nextRank ? nextRank->m_skillPointsNeeded : INT_MAX;
2675 m_levelDown = 0;
2676 m_sciences.clear();
2677 m_sciencePurchasePoints = getPlayerTemplate() ? getPlayerTemplate()->getIntrinsicSciencePurchasePoints() : 0;
2678 const RankInfo* curRank = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(m_rankLevel);
2679 m_sciencePurchasePoints += curRank ? curRank->m_sciencePurchasePointsGranted : 0;
2680 m_generalName = TheGameText? TheGameText->fetch("SCIENCE:GeneralName"):UnicodeString::TheEmptyString;
2681 resetSciences();
2682}
2683
2684//=============================================================================
2686Bool Player::setRankLevel(Int newLevel)
2687{
2688 if (newLevel < 1)
2689 newLevel = 1;
2690 else if (newLevel > TheRankInfoStore->getRankLevelCount())
2691 newLevel = TheRankInfoStore->getRankLevelCount();
2692
2693 if (newLevel > TheGameLogic->getRankLevelLimit())
2694 newLevel = TheGameLogic->getRankLevelLimit();
2695
2696 if (newLevel == m_rankLevel)
2697 return false;
2698
2699 //DEBUG_LOG(("Set Rank Level %d -> %d\n",m_rankLevel,newLevel));
2700
2701 Int oldSPP = m_sciencePurchasePoints;
2702
2703 if (newLevel < m_rankLevel)
2704 {
2705 // when downgrading in rank, you lose everything. oh well...
2706 resetRank();
2707 }
2708
2709 for (Int i = m_rankLevel + 1; i <= newLevel; ++i)
2710 {
2711 const RankInfo* rank = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(i);
2712 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(rank, ("rank should never be null here"));
2713 if (rank)
2714 {
2715 //addSciencePurchasePoints(rank->m_sciencePurchasePointsGranted);
2716 // do this directly, so we can defer the UI notification till the end
2717 m_sciencePurchasePoints += rank->m_sciencePurchasePointsGranted;
2718 if (m_sciencePurchasePoints < 0)
2719 m_sciencePurchasePoints = 0;
2720
2721 if (m_skillPoints < rank->m_skillPointsNeeded)
2722 m_skillPoints = rank->m_skillPointsNeeded;
2723
2724 for (ScienceVec::const_iterator it = rank->m_sciencesGranted.begin(); it != rank->m_sciencesGranted.end(); ++it)
2725 {
2726 addScience(*it);
2727 }
2728
2729 m_levelDown = rank->m_skillPointsNeeded;
2730 }
2731 }
2732
2733 const RankInfo* nextRank = TheRankInfoStore->getRankInfo(newLevel + 1);
2734 m_levelUp = nextRank ? nextRank->m_skillPointsNeeded : INT_MAX;
2735 m_rankLevel = newLevel;
2736
2737 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_skillPoints >= m_levelDown && m_skillPoints < m_levelUp, ("hmm, wrong"));
2738 //DEBUG_LOG(("Rank %d, Skill %d, down %d, up %d\n",m_rankLevel,m_skillPoints, m_levelDown, m_levelUp));
2739
2740 if (TheControlBar != NULL)
2741 {
2742 if( m_levelUp )
2743 {
2744 //Play an EVA sound
2745 if (isLocalPlayer())
2746 TheEva->setShouldPlay( EVA_GeneralLevelUp );
2747 }
2748
2749 // notify of rank-change first
2750 TheControlBar->onPlayerRankChanged(this);
2751
2752 // then of SPP change, if any
2753 if (oldSPP != m_sciencePurchasePoints)
2754 TheControlBar->onPlayerSciencePurchasePointsChanged(this);
2755 }
2756
2757 return true;
2758}

2778//=============================================================================
2779void Player::setScienceAvailability( ScienceType science, ScienceAvailabilityType type )
2780{
2781 ScienceType sType;
2782 ScienceVec::iterator it;
2783 Bool found = false;
2784
2785 //First remove it from disabled sciences if it's there.
2786 for( it = m_sciencesDisabled.begin(); it != m_sciencesDisabled.end(); ++it )
2787 {
2788 sType = *it;
2789 if( sType == science )
2790 {
2791 m_sciencesDisabled.erase( it );
2792 found = true;
2793 break;
2794 }
2795 }
2796 if( !found )
2797 {
2798 //If still not found, remove it from hidden sciences if it's there.
2799 for( it = m_sciencesHidden.begin(); it != m_sciencesHidden.end(); ++it )
2800 {
2801 sType = *it;
2802 if( sType == science )
2803 {
2804 m_sciencesHidden.erase( it );
2805 found = true;
2806 break;
2807 }
2808 }
2809 }
2810
2811 //At this point, this science shouldn't be disabled nor hidden!
2812 if( type == SCIENCE_DISABLED )
2813 {
2814 //Add science to disabled vec.
2815 m_sciencesDisabled.push_back( science );
2816 }
2817 else if( type == SCIENCE_HIDDEN )
2818 {
2819 //Add science to hidden vec.
2820 m_sciencesHidden.push_back( science );
2821 }
2822 else if( type == SCIENCE_AVAILABLE )
2823 {
2824 //Do nothing, because being available means that the science isn't in one of the hidden or disabled vecs.
2825 }
2826}

2828//=============================================================================
2829ScienceAvailabilityType Player::getScienceAvailabilityTypeFromString( const AsciiString& name )
2830{
2831 for( Int i = 0; i < SCIENCE_AVAILABILITY_COUNT; i++ )
2832 {
2833 if( !name.compareNoCase( ScienceAvailabilityNames[ i ] ) )
2834 {
2835 return (ScienceAvailabilityType)i;
2836 }
2837 }
2838 return SCIENCE_AVAILABILITY_INVALID;
2839}
2840
2841namespace
2842{
2843 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2844 // For countExisting
2845 struct TypeCountData
2846 {
2847 UnsignedInt count;
2848 const ThingTemplate *type;
2849 NameKeyType linkKey;
2850 Bool checkProductionInterface;
2851 };
2852}
2853
2854// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2856// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2857static void countExisting( Object *obj, void *userData )
2858{
2859 // Don't care about dead objects
2860 if ( obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
2861 return;
2862
2863 TypeCountData *typeCountData = (TypeCountData *)userData;
2864
2865 // Compare templates
2866 if ( typeCountData->type->isEquivalentTo( obj->getTemplate() ) ||
2867 ( typeCountData->linkKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID && obj->getTemplate() != NULL && typeCountData->linkKey == obj->getTemplate()->getMaxSimultaneousLinkKey() ) )
2868 {
2869 typeCountData->count++;
2870 }
2871
2872 // Also consider objects that have a production update interface
2873 if ( typeCountData->checkProductionInterface )
2874 {
2875 ProductionUpdateInterface *pui = ProductionUpdate::getProductionUpdateInterfaceFromObject( obj );
2876 if( pui )
2877 {
2878 // add the count of this type that are in the queue
2879 typeCountData->count += pui->countUnitTypeInQueue( typeCountData->type );
2880 } // end if
2881 }
2882} // end countInProduction
2883
2884//=============================================================================
2885// Make sure that building another of this unit/structure/object won't exceed MaxSimultaneousOfType()
2886Bool Player::canBuildMoreOfType( const ThingTemplate *whatToBuild ) const
2887{
2888 // make sure we're not maxed out for this type of unit.
2889 UnsignedInt maxSimultaneousOfType = whatToBuild->getMaxSimultaneousOfType();
2890 if (maxSimultaneousOfType != 0)
2891 {
2892
2893 TypeCountData typeCountData;
2894 typeCountData.count = 0;
2895 typeCountData.type = whatToBuild;
2896 typeCountData.linkKey = whatToBuild->getMaxSimultaneousLinkKey();
2897 // Assumption: Things with a KINDOF_STRUCTURE flag can never be built from
2898 // a factory (ProductionUpdateInterface), because the building can't move
2899 // out of the factory. When we do our Starcraft port and have flying Terran
2900 // buildings, we'll have to change this ;-)
2901 // Remember: To ASSUME makes an ASS out of U and ME.
2902 typeCountData.checkProductionInterface = !whatToBuild->isKindOf( KINDOF_STRUCTURE );
2903
2904 iterateObjects( countExisting, &typeCountData );
2905 if( typeCountData.count >= maxSimultaneousOfType )
2906 return false;
2907 }
2908 return true;
2909}
2910
2911//=============================================================================
2912Bool Player::canBuild(const ThingTemplate *tmplate) const
2913{
2914 if (!tmplate)
2915 return false;
2916
2917 if (!allowedToBuild(tmplate))
2918 return false;
2919
2920 if (tmplate->getBuildable() == BSTATUS_NO)
2921 return false;
2922
2923 if (tmplate->getBuildable() == BSTATUS_IGNORE_PREREQUISITES)
2924 return true;
2925
2926 if (tmplate->getBuildable() == BSTATUS_ONLY_BY_AI && getPlayerType() != PLAYER_COMPUTER)
2927 return false;
2928
2929 // else BSTATUS tmplate->getBuildable() == BSTATUS_YES
2930 {
2931
2932 // we must satisfy all of the prereqs
2933 Bool prereqsOK = true;
2934 for (Int i = 0; i < tmplate->getPrereqCount(); i++)
2935 {
2936 const ProductionPrerequisite *pre = tmplate->getNthPrereq(i);
2937 if (pre->isSatisfied(this) == false )
2938 prereqsOK = false;
2939 }
2940
2941#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
2942 if (ignoresPrereqs())
2943 prereqsOK = true;
2944#endif
2945
2946 if (!prereqsOK)
2947 return false;
2948
2949 }
2950
2951 if ( !canBuildMoreOfType( tmplate ) )
2952 return false;
2953
2954
2955 return true;
2956}
2957
2958//=================================================================================================
2959Bool Player::canAffordBuild( const ThingTemplate *whatToBuild ) const
2960{
2961 // make sure we have enough money to build this
2962 const Money *money = getMoney();
2963 if( whatToBuild->calcCostToBuild( this ) <= money->countMoney() )
2964 {
2965 return true;
2966 }
2967 return false;
2968}
2969
2970//=================================================================================================
2971void Player::deleteUpgradeList( void )
2972{
2973 Upgrade *next;
2974
2975 // delete all of the upgrades we have
2976 while( m_upgradeList )
2977 {
2978
2979 next = m_upgradeList->friend_getNext();
2980 m_upgradeList->deleteInstance();
2981 m_upgradeList = next;
2982
2983 } // end while
2984
2985 // This doesn't call removeUpgrade, so clear these ourselves.
2986 m_upgradesInProgress.clear();
2987 m_upgradesCompleted.clear();
2988
2989} // end deleteUpgradeList
2990
2991//=================================================================================================
2993//=================================================================================================
2994Upgrade *Player::findUpgrade( const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeTemplate )
2995{
2996 Upgrade *upgrade;
2997
2998 for( upgrade = m_upgradeList; upgrade; upgrade = upgrade->friend_getNext() )
2999 if( upgrade->getTemplate() == upgradeTemplate )
3000 return upgrade;
3001
3002 return NULL;
3003
3004} // end findUpgrade

3034//=================================================================================================
3036//=================================================================================================
3037Upgrade *Player::addUpgrade( const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeTemplate, UpgradeStatusType status )
3038{
3039 Upgrade *u = findUpgrade( upgradeTemplate );
3040
3041 // if no upgrade instance found, make a new one
3042 if( u == NULL )
3043 {
3044
3045 // make new one
3046 u = newInstance(Upgrade)( upgradeTemplate );
3047
3048 // tie to list
3049 u->friend_setPrev( NULL );
3050 u->friend_setNext( m_upgradeList );
3051 if( m_upgradeList )
3052 m_upgradeList->friend_setPrev( u );
3053 m_upgradeList = u;
3054
3055 } // end if
3056
3057 // set the new status for the upgrade
3058 u->setStatus( status );
3059
3060 // Update our Bitmasks
3061 UpgradeMaskType newMask = upgradeTemplate->getUpgradeMask();
3062 if( status == UPGRADE_STATUS_IN_PRODUCTION )
3063 {
3064 m_upgradesInProgress.set( newMask );
3065 }
3066 else if( status == UPGRADE_STATUS_COMPLETE )
3067 {
3068 m_upgradesInProgress.clear( newMask );
3069 m_upgradesCompleted.set( newMask );
3070 onUpgradeCompleted( upgradeTemplate );
3071 }
3072
3073 if( ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer() == this )
3074 {
3075 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();
3076 }
3077
3078 return u;
3079
3080} // end addUpgrade

3082//=================================================================================================
3086void Player::onUpgradeCompleted( const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeTemplate )
3087{
3088 for (PlayerTeamList::iterator it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin();
3089 it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it)
3090 {
3091 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
3092 {
3093 Team *team = iter.cur();
3094 if( team == NULL )
3095 {
3096 continue;
3097 }
3098 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iterObj = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iterObj.done(); iterObj.advance())
3099 {
3100 Object *obj = iterObj.cur();
3101 if( obj == NULL )
3102 {
3103 continue;
3104 }
3105 // Dear copy-paste monkeys, the meat of this iterate-all-player-objects loop goes twixt the MEAT comments
3106
3107 obj->updateUpgradeModules();
3108
3109 // end MEAT
3110 }
3111 }
3112 }
3113}

3115//=================================================================================================
3117//=================================================================================================
3118void Player::removeUpgrade( const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeTemplate )
3119{
3120 Upgrade *upgrade = findUpgrade( upgradeTemplate );
3121
3122 if( upgrade )
3123 {
3124 if( upgrade->friend_getNext() )
3125 upgrade->friend_getNext()->friend_setPrev( upgrade->friend_getPrev() );
3126 if( upgrade->friend_getPrev() )
3127 upgrade->friend_getPrev()->friend_setNext( upgrade->friend_getNext() );
3128 else
3129 m_upgradeList = upgrade->friend_getNext();
3130
3131 // Clear this upgrade's bits from our mind
3132 UpgradeMaskType oldMask = upgradeTemplate->getUpgradeMask();
3133 m_upgradesInProgress.clear( oldMask );
3134 m_upgradesCompleted.clear( oldMask );
3135
3136 if( upgrade->getStatus() == UPGRADE_STATUS_COMPLETE )
3137 onUpgradeRemoved();
3138
3139 if( ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer() == this )
3140 {
3141 TheControlBar->markUIDirty();
3142 }
3143
3144 } // end if
3145
3146} // end removeUpgrade

3161//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3163//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3164void Player::addRadar( Bool disableProof )
3165{
3166 Bool hadRadar = hasRadar();
3167
3168 // increment count
3169 ++m_radarCount;
3170
3171 if( disableProof )
3172 ++m_disableProofRadarCount;// Disable proof is also in the normal refcount
3173
3174 if( !hadRadar && hasRadar() && okToPlayRadarEdgeSound() )
3175 {
3176 // This player just got radar, so play the "You have Radar!" sound
3177 AudioEventRTS soundToPlay = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_radarOnlineSound;
3178 soundToPlay.setPlayerIndex(getPlayerIndex());
3179 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&soundToPlay);
3180 }
3181} // end addRadar
3182
3183//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3185//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3186void Player::removeRadar( Bool disableProof )
3187{
3188 Bool hadRadar = hasRadar();
3189
3190 // decrement count
3191 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( m_radarCount > 0, ("removeRadar: An Object is taking its radar away, but the player radar count says they don't have radar!\n") );
3192 --m_radarCount;
3193
3194 if( disableProof )
3195 --m_disableProofRadarCount;// Disable proof is also in the normal refcount
3196
3197 if( hadRadar && !hasRadar() && okToPlayRadarEdgeSound() )
3198 {
3199 // This player just lost radar, so play the "You lost Radar!" sound
3200 AudioEventRTS soundToPlay = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_radarOfflineSound;
3201 soundToPlay.setPlayerIndex(getPlayerIndex());
3202 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&soundToPlay);
3203 }
3204} // end removeRadar
3205

3213 && !hasRadar() && okToPlayRadarEdgeSound() )
3214 {
3215 // This player just lost radar, so play the "You lost Radar!" sound
3216 AudioEventRTS soundToPlay = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_radarOfflineSound;
3217 soundToPlay.setPlayerIndex(getPlayerIndex());
3218 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&soundToPlay);
3219 }
3220}

3231 AudioEventRTS soundToPlay = TheAudio->getMiscAudio()->m_radarOnlineSound;

3284{
3285

3292
3293void Player::resetOrStartSpecialPowerReadyFrame( const SpecialPowerTemplate *temp )
3294{
3295
3296 UnsignedInt lookupID = temp->getID();
3297 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
3298
3299 SpecialPowerReadyTimerType *timer;
3300 SpecialPowerReadyTimerListIterator it;
3301 for( it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.begin(); it != m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.end(); ++it )
3302 {
3303 timer = &(*it);
3304 if ( timer->m_templateID == lookupID )
3305 {
3306 timer->m_readyFrame = now + temp->getReloadTime();
3307 return;
3308 }
3309 }
3310
3311 addNewSharedSpecialPowerTimer( temp, now );
3312}

3316{

3319 for( it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.begin(); it != m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.end(); ++it )
3320 {
3321 timer = &(*it);
3322 if ( timer->m_templateID == temp->getID() )
3323 {
3324 timer->m_readyFrame = frame;
3325 return;
3326 }
3327 }
3328
3329 addNewSharedSpecialPowerTimer( temp, frame );
3330}

3336//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3337UnsignedInt Player::getOrStartSpecialPowerReadyFrame( const SpecialPowerTemplate *temp)
3338{
3339
3340 UnsignedInt lookupID = temp->getID();
3341 UnsignedInt now = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
3342
3343 SpecialPowerReadyTimerType *timer;
3344 SpecialPowerReadyTimerListIterator it;
3345
3346
3347 UnsignedInt count = 0;
3348 UnsignedInt timerID = 0xfacade;
3349
3350 for( it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.begin(); it != m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.end(); ++it )
3351 {
3352 timer = &(*it);
3353 ++count;
3354
3355 timerID = timer->m_templateID;
3356
3357 if ( timerID == lookupID )
3358 {
3359 return timer->m_readyFrame;
3360 }
3361 }
3362
3363 addNewSharedSpecialPowerTimer( temp, now );
3364 return now;
3365

3379 body->setMaxHealth(body->getMaxHealth() * healthFactor, PRESERVE_RATIO);
3380 else
3381 body->setMaxHealth(body->getMaxHealth() / healthFactor, PRESERVE_RATIO);
3382 }
3383 static const WeaponBonusConditionType wbonus[PLAYERTYPE_COUNT][DIFFICULTY_COUNT] =
3384 {
3385 {
3386 WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_SOLO_HUMAN_EASY,

3388 WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_SOLO_HUMAN_HARD
3389 },

3391 WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_SOLO_AI_EASY,
3392 WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_SOLO_AI_NORMAL,
3393 WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_SOLO_AI_HARD
3394 }
3395 };
3396 if (apply)
3397 obj->setWeaponBonusCondition(wbonus[getPlayerType()][getPlayerDifficulty()]);
3398 else
3399 obj->clearWeaponBonusCondition(wbonus[getPlayerType()][getPlayerDifficulty()]);
3400 }
