3421//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3422// note, bonus is an in-out parm.
3423void Player::changeBattlePlan( BattlePlanStatus plan, Int delta, BattlePlanBonuses *bonus )
3424{
3425 DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(bonus, this, NULL);
3426 Bool addBonus = false;
3427 Bool removeBonus = false;
3428 switch( plan )
3429 {
3430 case PLANSTATUS_BOMBARDMENT:
3431 {
3432 m_bombardBattlePlans += delta;
3433 if( m_bombardBattlePlans == 1 && delta == 1 )
3434 {
3435 addBonus = true;
3436 }
3437 else if( m_bombardBattlePlans == 0 && delta == -1 )
3438 {
3439 removeBonus = true;
3440 }
3441 break;
3442 }
3443 case PLANSTATUS_HOLDTHELINE:
3444 {
3445 m_holdTheLineBattlePlans += delta;
3446 if( m_holdTheLineBattlePlans == 1 && delta == 1 )
3447 {
3448 addBonus = true;
3449 }
3450 else if( m_holdTheLineBattlePlans == 0 && delta == -1 )
3451 {
3452 removeBonus = true;
3453 }
3454 break;
3455 }
3456 case PLANSTATUS_SEARCHANDDESTROY:
3457 {
3458 m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans += delta;
3459 if( m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans == 1 && delta == 1 )
3460 {
3461 addBonus = true;
3462 }
3463 else if( m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans == 0 && delta == -1 )
3464 {
3465 removeBonus = true;
3466 }
3467 break;
3468 }
3469 }
3470 if( addBonus )
3471 {
3472 applyBattlePlanBonusesForPlayerObjects( bonus );
3473 }
3474 else if( removeBonus )
3475 {
3476 //First, inverse the bonuses
3477 bonus->m_armorScalar = 1.0f / __max( bonus->m_armorScalar, 0.01f );
3478 bonus->m_sightRangeScalar = 1.0f / __max( bonus->m_sightRangeScalar, 0.01f );
3479 if( bonus->m_bombardment > 0 )
3480 {
3481 bonus->m_bombardment = -1;
3482 }
3483 if( bonus->m_holdTheLine > 0 )
3484 {
3485 bonus->m_holdTheLine = -1;
3486 }
3487 if( bonus->m_searchAndDestroy > 0 )
3488 {
3489 bonus->m_searchAndDestroy = -1;
3490 }
3491
3492 applyBattlePlanBonusesForPlayerObjects( bonus );
3493 }
3494}
3495
3496//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3497Int Player::getBattlePlansActiveSpecific( BattlePlanStatus plan ) const
3498{
3499 switch( plan )
3500 {
3501 case PLANSTATUS_BOMBARDMENT:
3502 {
3503 return m_bombardBattlePlans;
3504 }
3505 case PLANSTATUS_HOLDTHELINE:
3506 {
3507 return m_holdTheLineBattlePlans;
3508 }
3509 case PLANSTATUS_SEARCHANDDESTROY:
3510 {
3511 return m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans;
3512 }
3513 }
3514 return 0;
3515}

3517//------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3518static void localApplyBattlePlanBonusesToObject( Object *obj, void *userData )
3519{
3520 const BattlePlanBonuses* bonus = (const BattlePlanBonuses*)userData;
3521 Object *objectToValidate = obj;
3522 Object *objectToModify = obj;
3523
3524 DEBUG_LOG(("localApplyBattlePlanBonusesToObject() - looking at object %d (%s)\n",
3525 (objectToValidate)?objectToValidate->getID():INVALID_ID,
3526 (objectToValidate)?objectToValidate->getTemplate()->getName().str():"<No Object>"));
3527
3528 //First check if the obj is a projectile -- if so split the
3529 //object so that the producer is validated, not the projectile.
3530 Bool isProjectile = obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_PROJECTILE );
3531 if( isProjectile )
3532 {
3533 objectToValidate = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( obj->getProducerID() );
3534 DEBUG_LOG(("Object is a projectile - looking at object %d (%s) instead\n",
3535 (objectToValidate)?objectToValidate->getID():INVALID_ID,
3536 (objectToValidate)?objectToValidate->getTemplate()->getName().str():"<No Object>"));
3537 }
3538 if( objectToValidate && objectToValidate->isAnyKindOf( bonus->m_validKindOf ) )
3539 {
3540 DEBUG_LOG(("Is valid kindof\n"));
3541 if( !objectToValidate->isAnyKindOf( bonus->m_invalidKindOf ) )
3542 {
3543 DEBUG_LOG(("Is not invalid kindof\n"));
3544 //Quite the trek eh? Now we can apply the bonuses!
3545 if( !isProjectile )
3546 {
3547 DEBUG_LOG(("Is not projectile. Armor scalar is %g\n", bonus->m_armorScalar));
3548 //Really important to not apply certain bonuses like health augmentation to projectiles!
3549 if( bonus->m_armorScalar != 1.0f )
3550 {
3551 BodyModuleInterface *body = objectToModify->getBodyModule();
3552 body->applyDamageScalar( bonus->m_armorScalar );
3553 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("Applying armor scalar of %g (%8.8X) to object %d (%ls) owned by player %d\n",
3554 bonus->m_armorScalar, AS_INT(bonus->m_armorScalar), objectToModify->getID(),
3555 objectToModify->getTemplate()->getDisplayName().str(),
3556 objectToModify->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerIndex()));
3557 DEBUG_LOG(("After apply, armor scalar is %g\n", body->getDamageScalar()));
3558 }
3559 if( bonus->m_sightRangeScalar != 1.0f )
3560 {
3561 objectToModify->setVisionRange( obj->getVisionRange() * bonus->m_sightRangeScalar );
3562 objectToModify->setShroudClearingRange( obj->getShroudClearingRange() * bonus->m_sightRangeScalar );
3563 }
3564 }
3565
3566 if( bonus->m_bombardment > 0 )
3567 {
3568 objectToModify->setWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_BOMBARDMENT );
3569 }
3570 else
3571 {
3572 objectToModify->clearWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_BOMBARDMENT );
3573 }
3574 if( bonus->m_holdTheLine > 0 )
3575 {
3576 objectToModify->setWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_HOLDTHELINE );
3577 }
3578 else
3579 {
3580 objectToModify->clearWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_HOLDTHELINE );
3581 }
3582 if( bonus->m_searchAndDestroy > 0 )
3583 {
3584 objectToModify->setWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_SEARCHANDDESTROY );
3585 }
3586 else
3587 {
3588 objectToModify->clearWeaponBonusCondition( WEAPONBONUSCONDITION_BATTLEPLAN_SEARCHANDDESTROY );
3589 }
3590 }
3591 }
3592}
3593
3594//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3595//New object or converted object gaining our current battle plan bonuses.
3596//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3597void Player::applyBattlePlanBonusesForObject( Object *obj ) const
3598{
3599 localApplyBattlePlanBonusesToObject( obj, m_battlePlanBonuses );
3600}
3601
3602//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3603//Object has just left our team, so remove it's bonuses!
3604//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3605void Player::removeBattlePlanBonusesForObject( Object *obj ) const
3606{
3607 //Copy bonuses, and invert them.
3608 BattlePlanBonuses* bonus = newInstance(BattlePlanBonuses);
3609 *bonus = *m_battlePlanBonuses;
3610 bonus->m_armorScalar = 1.0f / __max( bonus->m_armorScalar, 0.01f );
3611 bonus->m_sightRangeScalar = 1.0f / __max( bonus->m_sightRangeScalar, 0.01f );
3612 bonus->m_bombardment = -ALL_PLANS; //Safe to remove as it clears the weapon bonus flag
3613 bonus->m_searchAndDestroy = -ALL_PLANS; //Safe to remove as it clears the weapon bonus flag
3614 bonus->m_holdTheLine = -ALL_PLANS; //Safe to remove as it clears the weapon bonus flag
3615
3616 DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(bonus, this, obj);
3617 localApplyBattlePlanBonusesToObject( obj, bonus );
3618
3619 bonus->deleteInstance();
3620}
3621
3622//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3623//Battle plan bonuses changing, so apply to all of our objects!
3624//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3625void Player::applyBattlePlanBonusesForPlayerObjects( const BattlePlanBonuses *bonus )
3626{
3627 DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(bonus, this, NULL);
3628
3629 //Only allocate the battle plan bonuses if we actually use it!
3630 if( !m_battlePlanBonuses )
3631 {
3632 DEBUG_LOG(("Allocating new m_battlePlanBonuses\n"));
3633 m_battlePlanBonuses = newInstance( BattlePlanBonuses );
3634 *m_battlePlanBonuses = *bonus;
3635 }
3636 else
3637 {
3638 DEBUG_LOG(("Adding bonus into existing m_battlePlanBonuses\n"));
3639 DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(m_battlePlanBonuses, this, NULL);
3640 //Just apply the differences by multiplying the scalars together (kindofs won't change)
3641 //These bonuses are used for new objects that are created or objects that are transferred
3642 //to our team.
3643 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_armorScalar *= bonus->m_armorScalar;
3644 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_sightRangeScalar *= bonus->m_sightRangeScalar;
3645 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_bombardment += bonus->m_bombardment;
3646 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_bombardment = MAX( 0, m_battlePlanBonuses->m_bombardment );
3647 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_holdTheLine += bonus->m_holdTheLine;
3648 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_holdTheLine = MAX( 0, m_battlePlanBonuses->m_holdTheLine );
3649 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_searchAndDestroy += bonus->m_searchAndDestroy;
3650 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_searchAndDestroy = MAX( 0, m_battlePlanBonuses->m_searchAndDestroy );
3651 }
3652
3653 DUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(m_battlePlanBonuses, this, NULL);
3654 iterateObjects( localApplyBattlePlanBonusesToObject, (void*)bonus );
3655}

3658//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3660//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3661void Player::processCreateTeamGameMessage(Int hotkeyNum, GameMessage *msg) {
3662 // GameMessage arguments are the object ID's of the objects that are to be in this team.
3663
3664 if ((hotkeyNum < 0) || (hotkeyNum >= NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS)) {
3665 DEBUG_CRASH(("processCreateTeamGameMessage got an invalid hotkey number"));
3666 return;
3667 }
3668
3669 m_squads[hotkeyNum]->clearSquad();
3670
3671 UnsignedByte numArgs = msg->getArgumentCount();
3672 for (UnsignedByte i = 0; i < numArgs; ++i) {
3673 ObjectID objID = msg->getArgument(i)->objectID;
3674 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(objID);
3675 if (obj != NULL) {
3676 // first, remove it from any other hotkey squads it is in.
3677 removeObjectFromHotkeySquad(obj);
3678 m_squads[hotkeyNum]->addObject(obj);
3679 }
3680 }
3681}
3682
3683//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3685//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3686void Player::processSelectTeamGameMessage(Int hotkeyNum, GameMessage *msg) {
3687 if ((hotkeyNum < 0) || (hotkeyNum >= NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS)) {
3688 DEBUG_CRASH(("processSelectTeamGameMessage got an invalid hotkey number"));
3689 return;
3690 }
3691
3692 if (m_squads[hotkeyNum] == NULL) {
3693 return;
3694 }
3695
3696 m_currentSelection->clearSquad();
3697
3698 VecObjectPtr objectList = m_squads[hotkeyNum]->getLiveObjects();
3699 Int numObjs = objectList.size();
3700
3701 for (Int i = 0; i < numObjs; ++i)
3702 {
3703 m_currentSelection->addObject(objectList[i]);
3704 }
3705
3706 if( numObjs > 0 )
3707 {
3708 getAcademyStats()->recordControlGroupsUsed();
3709 }
3710
3711}

3717 if ((hotkeyNum < 0) || (hotkeyNum >= NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS)) {

3723 return;
3724 }
3725
3726 if (m_currentSelection == NULL) {
3727 m_currentSelection = newInstance( Squad );
3728 }
3729
3730 VecObjectPtr objectList = m_squads[hotkeyNum]->getLiveObjects();
3731 Int numObjs = objectList.size();
3732
3733 for (Int i = 0; i < numObjs; ++i) {
3734 m_currentSelection->addObject(objectList[i]);
3735 }
3736}

3821//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3823//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3824void Player::addKindOfProductionCostChange( KindOfMaskType kindOf, Real percent )
3825{
3826 KindOfPercentProductionChangeListIt it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.begin();
3827 while(it != m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.end())
3828 {
3829
3830 KindOfPercentProductionChange *tof = *it;
3831 if( tof->m_percent == percent && tof->m_kindOf == kindOf)
3832 {
3833 tof->m_ref++;
3834 return;
3835 }
3836 ++it;
3837 }
3838
3839 KindOfPercentProductionChange *newTof = newInstance( KindOfPercentProductionChange );
3840 newTof->m_kindOf = kindOf;
3841 newTof->m_percent = percent;
3842 newTof->m_ref = 1;
3843 m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.push_back(newTof);
3844
3845}
3846
3847//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3849//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3850void Player::removeKindOfProductionCostChange( KindOfMaskType kindOf, Real percent )
3851{
3852 KindOfPercentProductionChangeListIt it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.begin();
3853 while(it != m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.end())
3854 {
3855
3856 KindOfPercentProductionChange* tof = *it;
3857 if( tof->m_percent == percent && tof->m_kindOf == kindOf)
3858 {
3859 tof->m_ref--;
3860 if(tof->m_ref == 0)
3861 {
3862 m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.erase( it );
3863 if(tof)
3864 tof->deleteInstance();
3865 }
3866 return;
3867 }
3868 ++it;
3869 }
3870 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(FALSE, ("removeKindOfProductionCostChange was called with kindOf=%d and percent=%f. We could not find the entry in the list with these variables. CLH.",kindOf, percent));
3871}
3872
3873//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3875//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3876Real Player::getProductionCostChangeBasedOnKindOf( KindOfMaskType kindOf ) const
3877{
3878 Real start = 1.0f;
3879 KindOfPercentProductionChangeListIt it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.begin();
3880 while(it != m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.end())
3881 {
3882
3883 KindOfPercentProductionChange *tof = *it;
3884 if(TEST_KINDOFMASK_MULTI(kindOf, tof->m_kindOf, KINDOFMASK_NONE))
3885 {
3886 start *= (1 + tof->m_percent);
3887 }
3888 ++it;
3889 }
3890 return (start);
3891}

3912// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3913// Little wrapper function so I can use it in iterateObjects, which is cool.
3914struct VisionSpiedStruct
3915{
3916 Bool setting;
3917 KindOfMaskType whichUnits;
3918 PlayerIndex byWhom;
3919};
3920
3921static void iterator_setUnitsVisionSpied( Object *obj, void * voidData)
3922{
3923 VisionSpiedStruct *data = (VisionSpiedStruct *)voidData;
3924
3925 // I feel I have to disapprove of the naming of this gathering of cell functions. It is called by death,
3926 // alliance change, containment, spy change, and dynamic view range as well as partition cell change.
3927 if( obj && obj->isAnyKindOf(data->whichUnits) )
3928 obj->setVisionSpied(data->setting, data->byWhom);
3929}
3930
3931// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3932void Player::setUnitsVisionSpied( Bool setting, KindOfMaskType whichUnits, PlayerIndex byWhom )
3933{
3934 VisionSpiedStruct data;
3935 data.setting = setting;
3936 data.whichUnits = whichUnits;
3937 data.byWhom = byWhom;
3938 // Being spied is now a property of the unit, not us, since we can spy only a portion of the enemy.
3939 iterateObjects( iterator_setUnitsVisionSpied, &data );
3940}

3968// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3970// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3971void Player::crc( Xfer *xfer )
3972{
3973 // Player battle plan bonuses
3974 Bool battlePlanBonus = m_battlePlanBonuses != NULL;
3975 xfer->xferBool( &battlePlanBonus );
3976 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("Player %d[%ls] %s battle plans\n", m_playerIndex, m_playerDisplayName.str(), (battlePlanBonus)?"has":"doesn't have"));
3977 if( m_battlePlanBonuses )
3978 {
3979 CRCDUMPBATTLEPLANBONUSES(m_battlePlanBonuses, this, NULL);
3980 xfer->xferReal( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_armorScalar );
3981 xfer->xferReal( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_sightRangeScalar );
3982 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_bombardment );
3983 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_holdTheLine );
3984 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_searchAndDestroy );
3985 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_validKindOf.xfer(xfer);
3986 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_invalidKindOf.xfer(xfer);
3987 }
3988
3989 xfer->xferInt( &m_skillPoints );
3990 xfer->xferInt( &m_sciencePurchasePoints );
3991
3992} // end crc

3994// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4006// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4007void Player::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
4008{
4009
4010 // version
4011 const XferVersion currentVersion = 8;
4012 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
4013 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
4014
4015 // money
4016 xfer->xferSnapshot( &m_money );
4017
4018 // upgrade list count
4019 Upgrade *upgrade;
4020 UnsignedShort upgradeCount = 0;
4021 for( upgrade = m_upgradeList; upgrade; upgrade = upgrade->friend_getNext() )
4022 upgradeCount++;
4023 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &upgradeCount );
4024
4025 if (version >= 7)
4026 {
4027 // preorder info
4028 xfer->xferBool( & m_isPreorder );
4029 }
4030
4031 if (version >= 8)
4032 {
4033 xfer->xferScienceVec(&m_sciencesDisabled);
4034 xfer->xferScienceVec(&m_sciencesHidden);
4035 }
4036
4037 // xfer upgrade instances
4038 AsciiString upgradeName;
4039 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4040 {
4041
4042 for( upgrade = m_upgradeList; upgrade; upgrade = upgrade->friend_getNext() )
4043 {
4044
4045 // write upgrade name
4046 upgradeName = upgrade->getTemplate()->getUpgradeName();
4047 xfer->xferAsciiString( &upgradeName );
4048
4049 // xfer upgrade data
4050 xfer->xferSnapshot( upgrade );
4051
4052 } // end for, upgrade
4053
4054 } // end if, save
4055 else
4056 {
4057 const UpgradeTemplate *upgradeTemplate;
4058
4059 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < upgradeCount; ++i )
4060 {
4061
4062 // read name
4063 xfer->xferAsciiString( &upgradeName );
4064
4065 // find template for this upgrade
4066 upgradeTemplate = TheUpgradeCenter->findUpgrade( upgradeName );
4067
4068 // sanity
4069 if( upgradeTemplate == NULL )
4070 {
4071
4072 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - Unable to find upgrade '%s'\n", upgradeName.str() ));
4073 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4074
4075 } // end if
4076
4077 // add upgrade to player, the status is invalid, but that's OK cause we're about to xfer it
4078 upgrade = addUpgrade( upgradeTemplate, UPGRADE_STATUS_INVALID );
4079
4080 // xfer upgrade data
4081 xfer->xferSnapshot( upgrade );
4082
4083 } // end for, i
4084
4085 } // end else, load
4086
4087 // radar info
4088 xfer->xferInt( &m_radarCount );
4089 xfer->xferBool( & m_isPlayerDead );
4090 xfer->xferInt( &m_disableProofRadarCount );
4091 xfer->xferBool( & m_radarDisabled );
4092
4093 // upgrades in progress
4094 xfer->xferUpgradeMask( &m_upgradesInProgress );
4095
4096 // upgrades complete
4097 xfer->xferUpgradeMask( &m_upgradesCompleted );
4098
4099 // energy info
4100 xfer->xferSnapshot( &m_energy );
4101
4102 //
4103 // team prototypes ... this is only the fact that team prototypes are on this player
4104 // it is not the team prototype data itself
4105 //
4106 UnsignedShort prototypeCount = m_playerTeamPrototypes.size();
4107 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &prototypeCount );
4108 TeamPrototypeID prototypeID;
4109 TeamPrototype *prototype;
4110 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4111 {
4112
4113 PlayerTeamList::iterator it;
4114 for( it = m_playerTeamPrototypes.begin(); it != m_playerTeamPrototypes.end(); ++it )
4115 {
4116
4117 prototype = *it;
4118 prototypeID = prototype->getID();
4119 xfer->xferUser( &prototypeID, sizeof( TeamPrototypeID ) );
4120
4121 } // end for
4122
4123 } // end if, save
4124 else
4125 {
4126
4127 // empty the list right now
4128 m_playerTeamPrototypes.clear();
4129
4130 // read all the data
4131 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < prototypeCount; ++i )
4132 {
4133
4134 // read id
4135 xfer->xferUser( &prototypeID, sizeof( TeamPrototypeID ) );
4136
4137 // find prototype
4138 prototype = TheTeamFactory->findTeamPrototypeByID( prototypeID );
4139
4140 // sanity
4141 if( prototype == NULL )
4142 {
4143
4144 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - Unable to find team prototype by id\n" ));
4145 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4146
4147 } // end if
4148
4149 // put in list
4150 m_playerTeamPrototypes.push_back( prototype );
4151
4152 } // end for, i
4153
4154 } // end else, load
4155
4156 // build list info
4157 UnsignedShort buildListInfoCount = 0;
4158 BuildListInfo *buildListInfo;
4159 for( buildListInfo = m_pBuildList; buildListInfo; buildListInfo = buildListInfo->getNext() )
4160 buildListInfoCount++;
4161 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &buildListInfoCount );
4162 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4163 {
4164
4165 // xfer each build list info
4166 for( buildListInfo = m_pBuildList; buildListInfo; buildListInfo = buildListInfo->getNext() )
4167 xfer->xferSnapshot( buildListInfo );
4168
4169 } // end if, save
4170 else
4171 {
4172
4173 //
4174 // destroy any build list that we got from loading the bare bones map, note that deleting
4175 // the head of these structures automatically deletes any links attached
4176 //
4177 if( m_pBuildList)
4178 m_pBuildList->deleteInstance();
4179 m_pBuildList = NULL;
4180
4181 // read each build list info
4182 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < buildListInfoCount; ++i )
4183 {
4184
4185 // allocate new build list
4186 buildListInfo = newInstance( BuildListInfo );
4187 buildListInfo->setNextBuildList( NULL );
4188
4189 // attach to the *end* of the list in the player
4190 if( m_pBuildList == NULL )
4191 m_pBuildList = buildListInfo;
4192 else
4193 {
4194 BuildListInfo *last = m_pBuildList;
4195
4196 while( last->getNext() != NULL )
4197 last = last->getNext();
4198
4199 last->setNextBuildList( buildListInfo );
4200
4201 } // end else
4202
4203 // xfer data
4204 xfer->xferSnapshot( buildListInfo );
4205
4206 } // end for,i
4207
4208 } // end else, load
4209
4210 // ai player data
4211 Bool aiPlayerPresent = m_ai ? TRUE : FALSE;
4212 xfer->xferBool( &aiPlayerPresent );
4213 if( (aiPlayerPresent == TRUE && m_ai == NULL) || (aiPlayerPresent == FALSE && m_ai != NULL) )
4214 {
4215
4216 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - m_ai present/missing mismatch\n" ));
4217 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;;
4218
4219 } // end if
4220 if( m_ai )
4221 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_ai );
4222
4223 // resource gathering manager
4224 Bool resourceGatheringManagerPresent = m_resourceGatheringManager ? TRUE : FALSE;
4225 xfer->xferBool( &resourceGatheringManagerPresent );
4226 if( (resourceGatheringManagerPresent == TRUE && m_resourceGatheringManager == NULL) ||
4227 (resourceGatheringManagerPresent == FALSE && m_resourceGatheringManager != NULL ) )
4228 {
4229
4230 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - m_resourceGatheringManager present/missing mismatch\n" ));
4231 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4232
4233 } // end if
4234 if( m_resourceGatheringManager )
4235 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_resourceGatheringManager );
4236
4237 // tunnel tracking system
4238 Bool tunnelTrackerPresent = m_tunnelSystem ? TRUE : FALSE;
4239 xfer->xferBool( &tunnelTrackerPresent );
4240 if( (tunnelTrackerPresent == TRUE && m_tunnelSystem == NULL) ||
4241 (tunnelTrackerPresent == FALSE && m_tunnelSystem != NULL) )
4242 {
4243
4244 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - m_tunnelSystem present/missing mismatch\n" ));
4245 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4246
4247 } // end if
4248 if( m_tunnelSystem )
4249 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_tunnelSystem );
4250
4251 // default team
4252 TeamID teamID = m_defaultTeam ? m_defaultTeam->getID() : TEAM_ID_INVALID;
4253 xfer->xferUser( &teamID, sizeof( TeamID ) );
4254 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
4255 m_defaultTeam = TheTeamFactory->findTeamByID( teamID );
4256
4257 // sciences
4258 if (version >= 5)
4259 {
4260 // m_sciences will contain some intrinsic sciences and stuff, which we don't want.
4261 // so nuke 'em for load.
4262 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
4263 m_sciences.clear();
4264 xfer->xferScienceVec(&m_sciences);
4265 }
4266 else
4267 {
4268 /*
4269 This code is WRONG WRONG WRONG and must not be used or mimicked; it
4270 is present for backwards "compatibility" only. (srj)
4271 */
4272 UnsignedShort scienceCount = m_sciences.size();
4273 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &scienceCount );
4274 ScienceType science;
4275 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4276 {
4277 ScienceVec::const_iterator it;
4278 for( it = m_sciences.begin(); it != m_sciences.end(); ++it )
4279 {
4280
4281 science = *it;
4282 xfer->xferUser( &science, sizeof( ScienceType ) );
4283 }
4284 }
4285 else
4286 {
4287 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < scienceCount; ++i )
4288 {
4289 xfer->xferUser( &science, sizeof( ScienceType ) );
4290 m_sciences.push_back( science );
4291
4292 }
4293 }
4294 /*
4295 This code is WRONG WRONG WRONG and must not be used or mimicked; it
4296 is present for backwards "compatibility" only. (srj)
4297 */
4298 }
4299
4300 // rank level
4301 xfer->xferInt( &m_rankLevel );
4302
4303 // skill points
4304 xfer->xferInt( &m_skillPoints );
4305
4306 // science purchase points
4307 xfer->xferInt( &m_sciencePurchasePoints );
4308
4309 // level up
4310 xfer->xferInt( &m_levelUp );
4311
4312 // level down
4313 xfer->xferInt( &m_levelDown );
4314
4315 // general name
4316 xfer->xferUnicodeString( &m_generalName );
4317
4318 // player relations
4319 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_playerRelations );
4320
4321 // team relations
4322 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_teamRelations );
4323
4324 // can build units
4325 xfer->xferBool( &m_canBuildUnits );
4326
4327 // can build base
4328 xfer->xferBool( &m_canBuildBase );
4329
4330 // observer
4331 xfer->xferBool( &m_observer );
4332
4333 if (version >= 2)
4334 {
4335 // current skill point modifier value
4336 xfer->xferReal( &m_skillPointsModifier);
4337 }
4338 else
4339 {
4340 m_skillPointsModifier = 1.0f;
4341 }
4342
4343 if (version >= 3)
4344 {
4345 xfer->xferBool( &m_listInScoreScreen );
4346 }
4347 else
4348 {
4349 m_listInScoreScreen = TRUE;
4350 }
4351 // attacked by
4352 xfer->xferUser( m_attackedBy, sizeof( Bool ) * MAX_PLAYER_COUNT );
4353
4354 // cash bounty percent
4355 xfer->xferReal( &m_cashBountyPercent );
4356
4357 // score keeper
4358 xfer->xferSnapshot( &m_scoreKeeper );
4359
4360 // size of and data for kindof percent production change list
4361 UnsignedShort percentProductionChangeCount = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.size();
4362 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &percentProductionChangeCount );
4363 KindOfPercentProductionChange *entry;
4364 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4365 {
4366 KindOfPercentProductionChangeListIt it;
4367
4368 // save each item
4369 for( it = m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.begin();
4370 it != m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.end();
4371 ++it )
4372 {
4373
4374 // get entry data
4375 entry = *it;
4376
4377 // kind of mask type
4378 entry->m_kindOf.xfer(xfer);
4379
4380 // percent
4381 xfer->xferReal( &entry->m_percent );
4382
4383 // ref
4384 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &entry->m_ref );
4385
4386 } // end for
4387
4388 } // end if, save
4389 else
4390 {
4391
4392 // sanity, list must be empty right now
4393 if( m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.size() != 0 )
4394 {
4395
4396 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList should be empty but is not\n" ));
4397 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4398
4399 } // end if
4400
4401 // read each entry
4402 for( UnsignedInt i = 0; i < percentProductionChangeCount; ++i )
4403 {
4404
4405 // allocate new entry
4406 entry = newInstance( KindOfPercentProductionChange );
4407
4408 // read data
4409 entry->m_kindOf.xfer(xfer);
4410 xfer->xferReal( &entry->m_percent );
4411 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &entry->m_ref );
4412
4413 // put at end of list
4414 m_kindOfPercentProductionChangeList.push_back( entry );
4415
4416 } // end for i
4417
4418 } // end else, load
4419
4420
4421
4422
4424 if ( version < 4 )
4425 {
4426 m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.clear();
4427 }
4428 else
4429 {
4430 UnsignedShort timerListSize = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.size();
4431 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &timerListSize );// HANDY LITTLE SHORT TO SIZE MY LIST
4432 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4433 {
4434
4435 SpecialPowerReadyTimerType *timer;
4436 SpecialPowerReadyTimerListIterator it;
4437 for( it = m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.begin(); it != m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.end(); ++it )
4438 {
4439 timer = &(*it);
4440 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &timer->m_templateID );
4441 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &timer->m_readyFrame );
4442 }
4443 }
4444 else
4445 {
4446 if( m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.size() != 0 ) // sanity, list must be empty right now
4447 {
4448 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - m_specialPowerReadyTimerList should be empty but is not\n" ));
4449 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4450 } // end if
4451
4452 // read each entry
4453 for( UnsignedInt i = 0; i < timerListSize; ++i )
4454 {
4455 SpecialPowerReadyTimerType timer;
4456
4457 // read data
4458 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &timer.m_templateID );
4459 xfer->xferUnsignedInt( &timer.m_readyFrame );
4460
4461 // put at end of list
4462 m_specialPowerReadyTimerList.push_back( timer );
4463
4464 } // end for i
4465 }
4466 }
4468
4469
4470
4471
4472 // squads
4473 UnsignedShort squadCount = NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS;
4474 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &squadCount );
4475 if( squadCount != NUM_HOTKEY_SQUADS )
4476 {
4477
4478 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - size of m_squadCount array has changed\n" ));
4479 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4480
4481 } // end if
4482 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < squadCount; ++i )
4483 {
4484
4485 if( m_squads[ i ] == NULL )
4486 {
4487
4488 DEBUG_CRASH(( "Player::xfer - NULL squad at index '%d'\n", i ));
4489 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
4490
4491 } // end if
4492
4493 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_squads[ i ] );
4494
4495 } // end for, i
4496
4497 // current squad selection
4498 Bool currentSelectionPresent = m_currentSelection ? TRUE : FALSE;
4499 xfer->xferBool( &currentSelectionPresent );
4500 if( currentSelectionPresent )
4501 {
4502
4503 // allocate squad if needed
4504 if( m_currentSelection == NULL && xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
4505 m_currentSelection = newInstance( Squad );
4506
4507 // xfer
4508 xfer->xferSnapshot( m_currentSelection );
4509
4510 } // end if
4511
4512 // Player battle plan bonuses
4513 Bool battlePlanBonus = m_battlePlanBonuses != NULL;
4514 xfer->xferBool( &battlePlanBonus ); //If we're loading, it just replaces the bool
4515 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
4516 {
4517 if (m_battlePlanBonuses)
4518 {
4519 m_battlePlanBonuses->deleteInstance();
4520 m_battlePlanBonuses = NULL;
4521 }
4522 if ( battlePlanBonus )
4523 {
4524 m_battlePlanBonuses = newInstance( BattlePlanBonuses );
4525 }
4526 }
4527 if( m_battlePlanBonuses )
4528 {
4529 xfer->xferReal( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_armorScalar );
4530 xfer->xferReal( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_sightRangeScalar );
4531 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_bombardment );
4532 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_holdTheLine );
4533 xfer->xferInt( &m_battlePlanBonuses->m_searchAndDestroy );
4534 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_validKindOf.xfer(xfer);
4535 m_battlePlanBonuses->m_invalidKindOf.xfer(xfer);
4536 }
4537 xfer->xferInt( &m_bombardBattlePlans );
4538 xfer->xferInt( &m_holdTheLineBattlePlans );
4539 xfer->xferInt( &m_searchAndDestroyBattlePlans );
4540
4541 if (version >= 6)
4542 {
4543 xfer->xferBool(&m_unitsShouldHunt);
4544 }
4545 else
4546 m_unitsShouldHunt = FALSE;
4547
4548} // end xfer
4549

4552// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

4555
4556} // end loadPostProcess
